reviews.rating_text: Excellent food ......good service from pritam and N.kumar......deserts were beautiful ...starters were blowing our mind. Fish was the best .
Good service and awesome food worth for money.. Serving Pritam and pan flavoured ice cream by selim was good and satisfied with their service. One should not miss this place...
Good ambience and good taste@ pritam We liked the way it is decorated...but pricing is high do work on special prices  .......... .....  ......
Good service _ pritam very excellent service.tasty food . Will recommend to cone have food.thank for service ...............................
Awesome and excellent service given by ABS tnagar- pritam and sartaj- Greetings, service and explanations for each menu......................
Santuhzra and Raju doing good service in ABS, and the service was amazing and the they were  more focused on the customer satisfaction and doing good and hoping the best service and there forth
Amazing food. Amazing service. Eklal.. thank you so much for the wonderfull service. The food was extraordinary especially the street food counter andthe starters.
Excellent NonVeg Buffet u get for a reasonable price. Their Service doesn't let you down. Amazing Food and nice place to be for a large group. I don't know much about their Veg Menu.

Eklal - service was awesome and lot variety of starters for veg. .. liked the deserts very much .. stone cold icecream was stunning .. special mention to corn and pineapple .   They were the stealers of the starters ..
This is a really good restaurant! Service is unbelievable... Special mention to santuhazra and Raju! Fro grills to starters, next level! Will come back!!!!!....

Tbh, I've never really enjoyed BBQs. I'm a vegetarian and you may ask what's there in a BBQ joint for a vegetarian. This place was unlike all the other Barbecue joints.  The starters, main course and desserts were tastier than BBQ Nation and absolute BBQ . Ambience was fabulous. 👍kudos.

The food experience was nice,the server served with good graceful faces(tempting to eat) but unfortunately I can't able to eat more😂. The cold stone,honey chicken and the desserts was very noticeable. Finally have an good time with the server #samir
I went for lunch with my teammates to this place and the buffet was really heavy had a plenty of unlimited starters and the deserts and juices they served were really delicious

We had our lunch here in this restaurant. Good ambience. The place was too noisy because of large groups. Service was very good. Coming to food like other BBQ they gave the starters but special mention among them is their pudina fish. Their kabab, cheese potatoes, honey BBQ wings everything was good. Main course we had naan and their paneer is soo soft and tastes good, their Kadai chicken was okkey. Deserts everything was good. I strongly recommend this for my friends.
Best associate. Amazing service. We liked it so much. Starters was awesome, service was really good. Executives were so friendly. Cold shot was the best.
We really enjoyed the food here...innovative food varities were top notch...service was awesome and the people are full happiness...everybody should try here..

Nisith and Sahil is the best in customer service. They surprised my friend who is goin to the states tomorrow with the cakes and stuff. It's just the best. Words ain't there to describe it. Well done Sahil and Nisith!!! We owe you big one for the surprise!!!

I went to Absolute Barbecues straight from the airport on Friday.Loved the place so much that ended up dining again on Sunday. About the food-The variety of food is tremendous. When you arrive, they plate the barbecues which has Paneer Tikka, Mushroom, Potato, Fried American Corns, Pineapples. Along with this, there is a live counter wherein you can get any vegetable of your choice grilled and pan fried. Also, you are served Golgappes with are very crispy along with tangy water. Something which ...

I am a regular at barbeque nation. So i am clearly able to compare ABs and Barbeque nation. The Cajun potato which is my favourite was a big let down in ABs. They need to improve on Desserts. Though lot of varieties in Non-Veg but need to improve on taste. I like the saucy Pineapple which they cut and serve

Absolute barbecue!! My bday dinner 06/08/2017✔My second visit to this group of joint , have been to their t nagar branch wen it was launched at 2015 Dec and now being to their second outlet feels great ! Quality has improved a lot and special mention to their service kudos to them !! They all were extremely sweet and took both the pros and cons in positive way , our table 's server was mr. Ranjan .  Starters - we had all of the non veg starters , chicken leg., chicken tandoori , mutton sheek kebab , fish grilled , repeated this four times with lots of crispy corn , water melon grilled and pine apple , all tasted so good I din like a mushroom but rest were jus awesome , special mention to their wish grill , it has improved in taste and quality very much , and got lots of varieties like county bird , quial, rabbit , shark , squid , Mains - it was large spread starting with chicken soup , chicken curry , there was special fruits chutney which impressed me a lot , it was mixture of fruits like water melon , pine apple , mango , raw mango and etc cooked with sugar , salt and lil bit of tamarind I guess it was too yum , dal, naan , butter naan , garlic naan , Mutton gravy , veg salad , fruits salad , curd rice , dum biryani 😍 I had a small portion of chicken dum biryani , curd rice , fruits chutney and salad. It was very yum and not like the usual buffet main course They hav e separate kids section for popcorn ,pani poori etc Desserts - live cold stone ice cream counter , I had chocolate ice cream with corn flakes and chocolate chips Cheese cakes , pastry , butterscotch mousse , phienee , jellies , fruits salad And my buddy got arranged for surprise cake from the restaurant and it was too fun the way the server were wishing while cutting the cake my day became even more special 😁 And that day was very special almost 10 bday baby 's were there 😂😂 and it became like a ritual all the servers were going to each table to sing bday song it was too fun and memorable  Costed 1975 for two with two virgin mojito

This place was so apted to catch up with my buddy on her bday for dinner :) such a wonderfully experience it was . Started off with grill starters , chicken leg , chicken grilled , mutton sheek, fish grilled , prawns , all repeated over 5 times with grilled pineapple , mushrooms , crispy corn , watermelon duhhhhIt was half filled with the starters alone n then hoped ok and tried the wish grill which had all meat 😂I tasted the country bird , shark , seafood club , quail , rabbit it tasted good and the way he makes it their specialityMain - had very less to make space for humungous desserts spread , had dum biriyani , curd rice , naan with butter chicken and salad , all tatted very much and tastyDesserts - what not , had cheese cake ,chocolate pastry , jelly , phirne, rabdi , customised cold stone ice cream of chocolate with nuts and chocolate sauce as topping loved the way he made it , and hospitality and service definitely needs a special mention , mr Ranjan  was our server and all our needs were satisfied , food and gesture was amazingLastly got surprise cake and loved the way they all wished while my buddy was cutting her cakeDay was amazing food was 4.5/5

This place was so apted to catch up with my buddy on her bday for dinner :) such a wonderfully experience it was . Started off with grill starters , chicken leg , chicken grilled , mutton sheek, fish grilled , prawns , all repeated over 5 times with grilled pineapple , mushrooms , crispy corn , watermelon duhhhhIt was half filled with the starters alone n then hoped ok and tried the wish grill which had all meat 😂I tasted the country bird , shark , seafood club , quail , rabbit it tasted good and the way he makes it their specialityMain - had very less to make space for humungous desserts spread , had dum biriyani , curd rice , naan with butter chicken and salad , all tatted very much and tastyDesserts - what not , had cheese cake ,chocolate pastry , jelly , phirne, rabdi , customised cold stone ice cream of chocolate with nuts and chocolate sauce as topping loved the way he made it , and hospitality and service definitely needs a special mention , mr Ranjan  was our server and all our needs were satisfied , food and gesture was amazingLastly got surprise cake and loved the way they all wished while my buddy was cutting her cakeDay was amazing food was 4.5/5
Food is too good and service is top class with not a single error ....they made my day and I recommend all to visit....and enjoy ... sometime u may find offer on near buy to get lower rate also

The food was so good. Service was first class. Unique taste to traditional Indian food. It's like Indian food on steroids. Taste so good. Kudos to the chef and service staff. Especially billa and sura. Ask the service staff about their names. Must go if u are in chennai.

We had a really fine time at Maplai.The Madurai mutton Biryani is very traditional and different from the authentic Dum Biryani, Fish tikka was also good.Ambience is good and the service they provide is appreciable.Thank you Mr.Basha sura really appreciate for making our stay pleasant.

A good home themed restaurant . Ambience was nice.Hospitality was great.i love the restaurant's special mutton kola and I like the way they served it. Guys who are gonna visit do try out chef's special dishes.Its a appropriate place to hang out with family.
Guntur  prawn fry was yummy!!!! Captain POKIRI helped us well to select the best of best from menu..!!! Completely enjoyed our dinner:)))))))))

Visited here on 13th June with an old friend after a gap of more than a year. Started with nandu rasam which although good was a bit hot for our palate. We ordered butter fried chicken and guntur prawns for starters. The chicken was awsome and tasted completely different from what I ve eaten before. Guntur prawns were prepared medium spicy as per request. The prawns were juicy and nice. We ordered a ambur chicken biriyani for our mains. The biriyani was yummy although in general we felt that all...
Really awesome experience . My stomach got fulfilled with non veg thaali.. Maplai rosemilk are yummy.... Me n my wife enjoyed having lunch here. Services are also good n special thanks to Theri...
Macho Manoj was really friendly and quick with service. Me and my friend had a really nice dinner . We had the loaded boneless wings which was the best dish.
Had a great time at Chili's... Good quality and quantity food surved by Mari! Thanks once again Mari for the smile and timely surved at table!!

The ambience was really good . The food was up to my expectation it was almost as good as the chilis outlets in the US . Service was really good . Mr Manoj made sure that our dining experience was top notch .
Amazing Arun is a great server. I have eaten here for the past 15 days straight. Good has been Good plus. Great new items added to the menu.

I'm from Malaysia visited here last time and now I visit twice because I love this place in express mall ...   The best part about chili staff dashing Devi remember us after so many months and her service is awesome she talk and feel like home friendly staff and I will come again just because of her ...  Food awesome ...

Went here with friends for a birthday treat. Easy to find this place and parking was okay. We got in and were immediately seated in a Table for 10. I had Penne Arabiata, Egg Plant Parmigiana Main Course and Strawberry cake pastry for Dessert. I also had a chance to taste Macroni and Cheese, Vegetable Lasagna, Spaghetti and Chicken Schnitzel too. I didn't like the Eggplant dish as much as the others. Ambience awesome. Service super awesome. Total bill for my 3 dishes that filled me up nicely came...
The cafe had a nice ambience and it's great price for great food.the pizza is so good .thr fries with Swiss cheese sause and jalapeno cheese balls was also gud.over all its a great experience

Location: It is just on the Peter's road.  Visibility: Good .  Parking : There is a small Lane abutting the building and the Peter's road where you can safely park your cars and bikes as they have very limited parking space .  Landmark : situated in the stretch from new collage to saravanan bhavan towards mount road , on Peters road.  Ambiance of the place:  It can be described as a cafe setting with nice lighting, wooden furniture with funky pipe lines used as tables support system.  Special fe...

Ambience:  the interiors look good, but it is very noisy. Not a place for quiet family dinners. Lighting is also good.   Service:  they respond very well, take minimum time to serve. Very efficient service I should say.   Food: Please try the mac n cheese. Highly recommended for cheese lovers. Great taste and value for money Pizzas aren't that good. The lasagna was also not that great They have a good range of desserts.  Overall a pocket friendly place to hang out with friends.
This is a Amazing place for the ambiance and the lightening with a coffee makes you feel better . I had a very great time with a coffee and reading a novel

The ambience will make you instantly fall in love with the place. Out of all the drinks on the menu, the lime mint cooler and carribean calypso were the only good ones. The assorted breads weren't impressive, especially the salsa was too oily. I loved the spinach leaves, an interesting concept and also the cheese fries. The mains were a big let down....there was an inexplicable lack of cheese in two dishes where I'd expect that in abundance - the pineapple pizza and macaroni The blueberry che...

Must visit place... Went for a buffet with my bestie.. It's a moderately priced private dining place.. Mr. Elvis, the manager was of a good service to us... Even though we went late they called us and confirmed if we are coming... The food is absolutely delicious.. Cinnamoi Chicken was brilliant.. Maybe the desert must be improved.. Ice cream was not upto the mark.. It was a bit difficult to take a selfie cos it was a little bit dark.. The lamp above the table can be hung a little bit higher... ...
Ambieance is really good with dim lights which is really peaceful apart frm ambieance the food is awesome fresh and tasty ...From starters to desrts are all really tasty..

I had gone with my friends on a sunday brunch. We had the vegetarian buffet. I should say it was a very nice and satisfying meal after a long time. The starters and the main course were both delicious. It is the best place to sit down and catch up with your friends and have a good meal. I would say its a definite visit.
Ambiance of the restaurant is really eye soothing and peace full .Food quality is really good, specially paneer tikka is really soft . Overall the foos is really tasty .
Deepak and Jack are good in serving !! I liked their way of approaching!! I enjoyed d buffet lot!!dishes are tasty and yummy !!..............

One of the best place in Chennai to hangout with your friends and have the best pastas,burgers/ sandwiches , starters, deserts, mojitos or sodas ... Totally a complete menu to full ur stomach... They serve the food with the best of its taste as you request it to be and the lasangnes were also so much mouth watering... The Ambience of the place is wat I got attracted simple and tidy with a single side wall painting with main things which are related to namma Chennai . Overall it's a must visit pl...

Amazing food. Had cream sauce pasta with vegetables and aglio e olio pasta for main course. The cream sauce was excellent and very filling. Aglio pasta was very spicy but delicious. We also ordered parsley garlic fries and 4cheese omlette for starters. The cheese omlette was excellent and well made and the fries were also good. Finished the early dinner with a Theobroma. The best dessert I've had in recent times. Tasted Excellent.  Adding to it, I had pesto pasta when I went the previous time. I...

4/5 for the place, the food and the restaurant experience. The extra 1 that makes it 5/5 is for the four legged beauty they have on the grounds which I heard, was recused by the proprietor of the restaurant and is being taken care of by, ever since! The food is brilliant. Made a very good first impression and I've been frequenting the place ever since. Pricing is nominal. The only tiny downside would be the serving time.

This review is for the 'happy hours' experience. Just in the name of buy 1 get 1 offer they make changes to the dishes in their own way which differ from the actual menu. For example  Mac n cheese- it was jus like white pasta. There was no sign of cheese in that. Tasted better with the seasoning. Fish burger- very simple burger served wit potato fries. Definitely not worth 350 bucks. French onion sandwich- Tasted unusual. Curd,onions and cheese were the filling.Bad. Grilled chicken sandwich - It...

It's really a Kool place to hangout with frnds  Nice pleasant ambience! Food is good , parsley garlic fries 🍟 were the best and mozzarella rounds  The quantity is very low ! One dish one person types  Rest is all good with place ❤️
Thank you Mahindra  n om Bahadur for the hospitality...Just love the food and ambience.. We often come here & always feel the happy..... Love this particular branch of paradise... Thank u..
Food was great and service was good.... Mr. Banmali took the service meticulously...:-) the dishes were described precisely to help the customer choose........... Had a good time..............
Prabhu ,banmal and Bala the showed the polite invitation for us...... food is delicious,  serving the food fastly... Best time to spend with friends....

U can have the worlds famous biryani there... Rate is bit okay with average cost of 350 per head.... Ambience is good.. Waiters are doing their job best with polite and respect... And mot of all waiting time will be very less.

Food was really awesome and specifically there is a service guy called Banamali who behaves really well and handled our table pretty well. I would certainly come back to this restaurant for that guy. Thumbs Up.
Food was too good and services found to be good. Bala, Prabhu and  OM services with customer was good. We have one suggestion that we found little oil in the food which can be avoided.

Pantry d'or @ anna nagar - been waiting to visit ever since I visited the one in alwarpet. As usual, just loved the sandwich and pizza. And not to forget the star of their menu, the fiery fries. We also tried a couple of desserts. Always satisfying, worth the money and a lovely place to spend time with ur close ones for dinner time.

An excellent place.....any items u pick on the menu wont fail u. Their speciality is the attention to detail ....everything will be so perfect u can hardly spot any mistakes. Having said that am yet to try their main courses but been their twice for their coffee and pastries. They jus blown me away. Once i tried tiramisu and on another occasion i went with blueberry cheese cake. Tiramisu was perfect.... smooth on the palate with a subtle coffee flavour....was divine and with blueberry cheese cak...
pizza and dessert are a bomb here would love to visit again  but the seating are too hard  was not able to lift the bottle of water as its so heavy😝

Location:  Very easy to find. As it's in the opposite lane of K4 Annanagar Police Station.  Parking:  Not a problem as the road is big enough. Also, Valet Parking available.   Crowd:  This place definitely attracts alot of crowd for its food and the price. You have to wait to get a seat if you come during peak hours. So please have a reservation to walk in and enjoy directly.  Seatings:  The only thing I hate in this place. It's definitely not comfortable. Especially the inside ones (Table for t...

Ordered for dinner ..Food was a bit late than expected but the food compensated for that !..We ordered brocolli soup and garlic bread for starters..The soup was thick and rich ...Flavour was awesome ...Nothin to complain about the garlic bread .For the main course we ordered ..Marinara pasta and white sauce pasta ..Both were perfectly cooked and  enriched with aroma .My mom had the paneer tikka wrap ..It was too huge and filling .On the whole it was heavy heavenly dinner .. Great value for money...

Hi m from chandigarh  and seriously this is the one place which serve best food till today ..its been almost 3 months I have never tasted anything which is typical North Indian but here I got proper food .and the staff jitender  is very humble..i tasted tandoori  platter which is really very delicious and the main course was also delicious and at last they served complimentary  pan shots and coconut burfi....
Awesome food, awesome ambience, great service, great playback songs, specially "Jitendra" was very courteous and very much hospitable. Enjoyed a lot.

the most authentic north indian food in chennai. i refer every one looking for north. i would suggest murgh tikka punjab grill and saag gosht among others. lehsuni naan adds to the savoury experience. the quantity of the food is generous. i suggest to visit in a group.  Mr.jitendra served us and was great at his job. He was humble and helped us get an amazing experience. A must visit.

The food and ambience is awesome! The service is splendid too, we were served by Jitendra. Overall a great experience. Recommended equally for vegetarian and non vegetarian food lovers, authentic North Indian food.
Nice ambiance good food... Very hospitable .. we were attended by Sajal and were well taken care of ... One of the better places to go if you are looking for north Indian food in Chennai

Worth a visit is all what I can say :) This place was cool and yup pocket friendly. I think if I will order all the items it wont evn cross 1500 😀. They have options in pasta n garlic bread. Along with it u can have lemon tea, orange/lemon tang.   We had beetroot & mayo garlic bread + masala mac pasta with lemon tea. No doubt their garlic breads are awsmm :) must try..  Place was bit crowded but thanks to Monday we got seats .. good part no vat urff service tax :) I feel if music can be dere ...
❤️ the best place to have pasta!❤️  The best part is that it's very cost effective and the food is just right for the price. The place has been improved and it's just too good.

Gives people few choices to make and makes sure they find everything good. Try everything in the menu and you won't be charged more than 1000₹. Customer service- finest and Swift. One liner- a small man can cast a large shadow.

I have visited Fusilli many times. Y'day 10/6 was my 1st visit to their new location. At 8PM it was crowded like anything. Decided for take away to avoid waiting time to get table & to wait after ordering in dinein. Our orders are assorted & Beetroot Mayo bread, mixed pasta, bell pepper pasta, lemon tea & orange tang. On curiosity, we had our food in car itself immediately. As I had multiple times, this time it has lost their signature touch & taste in all. Bread was too hard, i didn't like thei...
Try the Beetroot mayo bread😍 ,don't cringe when u read beetroot this dish was greeeeaaaat it was like I never hated beetroot at alllll 😂 . It's affordable  and a must hangout 😁

I really love this place for one thing that is the feel itself, it makes you feel like you are in one of the pubs from the English movies. Ambience of 10 downing street is amazing without a doubt and the crowd is great too. Drinks here are great and the food is also nice. Music they play here is amazing, such nice collection, be it Bollywood songs , metal or classics by famous bands. This place sets you in the right mood and you easily blend in as you enter here. A must visit place :)

Started with a bit of frustration awaiting a table... however Mr Umapathy behind the bar counter was quite kind & perceptive enough to get us a table and took good care of us. Definitely a go to British like Pub in Chennai... tasty food, quick service & a great chill out place with reasonable pricing!👍

The food was awesome and the ambience was also very good.....The behaviour of the staffs was also good ......The food was tasty and quite spicy ....The drinks were also good ....The costing is a bit high ....The Croud is also good...a perfect place for dinner.

Good food and beer the best place that comes to your mind is 10d.we had a few drinks and starters.. pepper chicken and chilly prawns were fine. But the chilli lamb was weird like the meat had a stink to it. Like some cheap cuts of meat were used. I asked the waiter to replace the dish with something else.. he got me chilli prawns coz again when asked for fish they use frozen basa not our local fish.. m not a big fan of basa.... Also we asked for a bottle of water... which he never got.. the serv...

10 D,it's been here for a while now.Its ambiance is so great.It has a classic touch to it.You will feel like you are entering rich salons of the 80s.Bar has a wide variety of drinks and food is great.A must visit place for friends and colleagues who wish to have a conversation with a drink

Basil With a Twist is on my daily commute and been thinking about visiting for a while now. Finally got the opportunity today, when a small group within my team decided to go for lunch. We called ahead and booked the Tabletop buffet.   The chef, Bogdan, and the host, Jawahar gave us a walk through of the menu. We ordered three different soups - a hot and sour chicken, a creamy chicken and a seafood delight. We loved the creamy chicken and seafood delight. The hot and sour seemed to have a bit to...

A great place with great ambience and friendly staffs.Food was yummy.we tried roasted pumpkins soup,melting sensation and herb rice with spinach sauce.All tasted great and the manager was kind enough to explain the procedure too.Do try the herb rice,great place and great food.
Good food. Good ambience. Nice service.   Just the usual, done better. No twist 😬  <I don't understand why the reviews have to be atleast 140 characters long. I am forced blabber something like this>
Ambience was decent and almost all the food was tasty!  Their desserts were awesome! It was a decent experience at basil with a twist and surely will be visiting next time 😀😀😀

All the rave reviews have been earned by this place.  We went all veg and could not get the entire spectrum as I would have liked to.  We went in for bruschetta for the starter followed by veg harmony pizza and traditional alfredo and closed with Honey glazed banana cake. We had a lemon tea and pink shake to go with this.  Bruschetta was good but not great. The veg harmony pizza blew us out. It was as good as it can get. The Alfredo was very good as well. The cream of the crop that rose to the t...
A decent place, come with your friends and family, have your delicious meal. Tasty foods. Difference types of food, we friends had fun here, welcome we'll.

#best place fa night lyf luvrzz soo scary in d nyt nd creativity level xtradinary best evr nyt on tat day small dinner wit momos amazing taste Bt d cost is not affordable it's slightly high Bt it's very thrilling xperience out ter..!!! Must try fa atleast once😍😍😍
average food.. very average service.. oly the theme was ok.. that too not great.. oly a couple of waiters for an entire room.. oly good for taking selfies with those ghosts..

I visited here for my friends birthday in the afternoon . So i dint find much thrill. Maybe should have visited for dinner . When we entered in the restaurant i dint find anything scary @due to day lite . The interiors were okie not like a real haunted theme . We were actualy sweating inspite of having an a/c there . We opted for the buffet and i would please dont opt for an buffet . The soup was good , chicken 65 was really bad ,naan and paneer buttermasala was the only thing i liked  ,mutton b...

Ambiance was okay ! One can choose from a wide range of dishes . Of all the dishes we had , mushroom pepper masala was above par . Pro tip - Don't try Butter roti as they were too hard to eat. And the background theme music was a bit grumpy. On the whole would rate the place between 3 and 3.5. For some it can be 4 even. Meena Vijayakumar

Savoury Sea shell is an Arabian delight. I've been here for years.  AMBIENCE & SERVICE : 4/5 Neat ambience with impressive interiors. All late evenings and weekends the place is over crowded.  Service is a bit slow but you'll definitely love their kind gestures.  FOOD : 4.5/5 Sea shell is the destination for Wonderfull Arabic food. From blissful shawarmas to mouth-watering barbecues. Special mentions to their grilled chicken.  Never a fan of the biryani here. I won't say it's bad but it's not go...

Good ambience...  Good service... Had mutton briyani, chicken briyani and chicken mayo sandwich. Compared to chicken Briyani mutton briyani tasted good. chicken briyani was also up to the standard. Quite stomach filling. Overall food tasted good .   Will I visit again?  Yesss yessssa 😛😜😝

Sea shell restaurent  is one of best restaurent in chennei..and management also so good..expecially tanx to mr mansoor sir(manager) bcz he is a gd personality nd charactor also very nice...   My fav food is pepper bbq nd koji samak nd matton Raan..its a gd tasty..i never eat this same tasety foods in other restauarents..and service also so gd nd very fast..best wishes for u all seashell managents..u did gd job👍
The Best Buffet Service. I Have Ever Attended. Food Was Lovely And Especially The Pinch Of Arabic Foods Was Lovely. Cant Ask For Anything More For A Proper Non-Veg Foodie.
Must go for pure non vegetarians ❤ try bbq , biryani ,falooda , tandoori and all non veg starters . Request for their restaurant spcl and try them

We had a get together in Bombay Braserrie Nungambakkam with my old college friends.  The ambience of this place was really good and it has valet parking lot.  Food is mainly North Indian , creamy food.   We ordered Soup , Veg and Non-Veg Soup , Chicken Biryani , Roti , Rumali roti , Chicken Kadai . All the dishes were amazing .  Finally we ordered Amritsar Gulfi   Apart from pricing the ambiance and taste is really good. I recommend this place to visit it at least once.

Bombay Brasserie After many attempts here, it finally happened on our wedding anniversary. Andrea Josephine Ambience was good. Food was excellent- Chicken tikka was juicy, mutton - tender, Chicken dum biryani full of flavor, Peach margarita - you should try. Service - prompt and courteous.

I have been to this restaurant a month back , the food was delicious and worthy.   So thought of spending some time today for lunch   but this time, we were disappointed about the starters- tandoori Gobi and stuffed mushrooms 😞    maybe we expected a lot this time 😖   but just imagine ,when someone is hungry and when they taste the starters with an expectation , and its not upto the marks .. 😞😞😞 So those two are not good to taste , that's my suggestion Main course - butter naan an...

Loved the ambience and the food. Their Mutton Gosht Biriyani and Fishes are the must tasters. The Service is Swift and Very Friendly the only concern is that they don't have any options for Soups and Ice creams... Overall a must visit for a good cossy dinning with some good flavors of dishes. Always book your table because this place gets filled easily on weekends.

One of the very few places I've rated 5/5. You can basically find nothing that leaves you dissatisfied here. Great ambience, staffed by pleasant attentive people. The food is just amazing. Apart from a la carte, they have this buffet kind of deal on weekday noons. You get the complete experience there. Their jalebis with rabdi is pure bliss.
yummy food and such a beautiful place to hang  i ordered chicken with mashed potato it was so soft and yummy and the drinks are too good to try

Went to this place with my family and my friends family. This place had a wide variety of options. Loved it. The taste was good in most of the items except the schezwan fried rice which tasted odd. We sat inside (not in the open area) because it was very humid. I thought for the kind of prices they charged the ambience was not upto the mark.  The food was served hot and reasonably quickly but the bill took an awfully long time to come - I think they had a computer malfunction, so could be a one ...

Food was amazing but we were denied to get a place in roof top the waiter said he will check for the availability before the food arrives but he never bothered to get back to us. They have offered an AC hall but around our table there was a very heavy medicated/sanitary smell which we could not sustain and we have requested for a change of table but unfortunately though they say it's an AC restaurant  but the AC was not turned on and in the hot summer we were suffocating. Overall it's ok but not...
Amazing food,totally worth the money spent. We booked a rooftop table and the view was just too good, the pleasant weather was just an add on.  Would love to visit again.

Great Place, best customer service and awesome food ! Except for the high cost and less quantity. Ambience of this place is so good and the food quality is really awesome. Crackling spinach is one of my favourite dish at this place. Great job !

Loved the food here. Finally a place where you can eat a guilt free burger. The meat is cooked with minimal oil combined with the low fat cheese and the wheat buns the burger was soft, juicy, delicious and well flavoured. I had the bourbon lamb and it didn't fail to disappoint it had a lovely smokey flavour. The bourbon ale ice tea gave me the feeling of JD ad coke minus the buzz. Will definitely visit again to try out other stuff on the menu. Lovely decor and shout out to Rohan who guided me th...

Ordered -Bourbon Lamb burger , German curry wurst, barbecue chicken burger Curry wurst and the lamb burger were amazing and definitely worth going back for. Minced Lamb patty was moist and flavorful. I was little surprised to find decent curry wurst in India. But the chicken burger was average, didn't like the patty much. Another issue I faced was that the first floor seating was too noisy (something wrong with the acoustics).  Overall food experience was good and I am so glad that we finally ha...

We visited along with my frineds on weekend were we planned to enjoy the beach and we planned to have our food. Then we mistakenly step in to the burgerman were the food was not so greatful taste and we have ordered the chicken burger, mexican chicken, classic veggie etc coming to milkshakes we had pink berry, choco brownie and irish coffee. The shakes was good but the choco brownie smell is like pungent i felt unhappy for the service and food too utterly disappointed big waste of money and time...
Great burgers - i had a Mexican veggie one and it was yum.. The ice teas are nice too..  Bright looking place too. Well priced.   Will visit again!

Went for a weekday evening snack Ordered Chicken boom burger Bourbon cottage cheese burger Pink berry shake Choco brownie shake  Ambience looks cool for a snack point. Two floors. First floor diners are alerted with a notification gadget as a token given to them while ordering itself. We should get the dishes from the ground floor as it gets ready. It's not a drawback for many. But a innovative one.  The burgers are of brown bread - healthy but not satisfactory for burger lovers. They can keep i...

It was on my bucket list for quite some time.  The virgin Pina colada was top notch. I scorned when I initially tasted the caramel house crepe. But then I liked it when I had it without the ice cream.  Lasagna was first class. I would give it a ten on ten. Best in the city if you ask me. The cafe is known for it's ambience and I totally vouch for it.   Great place and great food. Period.
Beautiful place,  Loved the ambiance. The food was S I M P L Y   D E L I C I O U S,  Do try the Lasagne there, it was just melting in my mouth, The coffee was great end to the feast,

Heard some good reviews about the place, the ambience really justifies it. The cafe looks so beautiful and calm inside out. The theme that they have built upon is bicycles, it is really interesting to see how these bicycles complement the restaurant ambience.  We ordered Chicken Tikka Pizza, Fish Fingers and Chicken Lasagna. The pizza had a thin crust a right amount of cheese. The Lasagna was good with few flaws, I wish it was more soft. The fish fingers were usual, nothing to rave about. Overal...

Pretty disappointed with the food and service. I have ordered the pizza margharitta, chicken burger which was not prepared well as i have visited here one of my friend suggested me that ciclo having good menu but ciclo staff didnt make me happy by providing the undercooked food and pathetic service. Utterly disappointed with the service and food too..

After having dinner, dropped by at this place to have some desserts.🍰  This place has been in my bookmarks for long and finally made it there😊  Location: get help from Google maps..it's in kotturpuram near anna library  Adequate parking available🚗  The cafe grabs your attention when u pass by this way..once I entered this place, I fell in love with this place..awesome interiors and decor..! Ambience is top notch.  This is a bicycle shop cum cafe..they sell and rent bicycles. A perfect p...

Zaitoon located in the midst of crazy velacherry traffic , the immediate problem one face is the parking. Even though the Valet service is available , the task looks big.  we Visited this place for dinner but found the place over- crowded  and long queue of people already waitng for the tables. so decided to have a take-out and just ordered full grilled chicken after seeing the queue for the take out too !!  It nearly took 25 mins to get the take out . The food tasted good and the packing too...

This restaurant has variety of options for non veg food..I came to this restaurant with less expectation as I hardly found any good restaurant serving north indian food in chennai. But this was a surprise.  The best one so far. Must try!!

We took the buffet and instantly regretted it. They definitely serve old stuff and the rice was too dry to eat. The chicken starter was hard as a rock and the roti was horrible. Bad quality and not worth spending on for sure. Pls improve.

Visited the place on June 8th for a team lunch. Ambience normal okayish Service was bit delayed Started with welcome drink-water melon juice Non veg starter - Arabian chicken ( had smoky flavour) , chicken barbeque, prawn fry,fish Second service of chicken had raw meat uncooked fleshy with salt direct from kitchen Veg starter- planner,potato,baby corn,sweet corn 🌽 No lemon or onion provided with starters No mutton starter provided during month of ramadan  Main courses: After power packed star...

Visited here for a friend's farewell treat for lunch.. it is easily identifiable as it is located opposite to velachery Grand mall. We have ordered various variety of veg and non veg starters, rotis, naans, few veg and non veg curries, biryanis,egg and mushroom fried rice and should say that all tasted good. Only disappointed with the curd rice they served in thinking as if it might be the millet curd rice I had at their nungambakkam branch. Royal falooda at the end was a chiller. This is among ...
best place for veg people... service is too good ..  ambience is good... we went for dinner with our family .. 😊 we are happy with the food and seriving.. nice place to visit

If you wish to experience fine dining in all its grandeur and ambience in Chennai, this is definitely one of those places.  1. They have a separate buffet section and Thali + ala carte section.  2. The ambience is really good, plush and makes it a wonderful choice for the family outings or corporate lunches with any foreigners.  3. They have strict timings for lunch and dinner - advisable to enquire before hand and reserve your seats, there have been walk in customers returning disappointed sinc...

Overrated fancy looking place with sub-standard tasting south Indian food.. And to add to insult the north Indian fare of the Buffet does not do justice to the name.. long on variety and so will always find a dish or two that will help quell the hunger.. but then, one does not go to such places merely because one needs food.. No more the great South Indian restaurant of yesteryears.. Time to move on to other Genuine Tamilian restaurants (many exist).  Will not waste time on this place unless und...

Excellent place for vegetarians. My friend read the reviews of this place and suggested we go there.  We went to the lunch buffet on a weekend. Strangely there was also a service option available for the same buffet - the waiters bring the same buffet food to your table but it costs 890 rs per head; the buffet option costs 540 rs (including taxes). There was no ala carte option for lunch on weekends; available only for dinner.  The food was excellent and quite fresh. Had a varitey of options ran...
Excellent ambience and service...The quality of food is too good and I would recommend this to anyone who wish to try pure vegetarian food in Chennai

Have been to this place for more than 8 times. Good food, but the disappointing fact is that taste of food doesn't have consistency. My favorite food over here is chicken biriyani, fish vepudu andhra style , Apollo fish.

We foodies were here on a Sunday afternoon on invite to try their new Punjabi menu which they were yet to launch then. Interior and décor have been swiftly ignored as the ambiance of the restaurant did not please me even a bit. Very minimal thought has been put up for the décor, this is what it seemed like. The seating arrangement of the place is jam packed and too congested. It was almost full when we entered at 1pm which seemed a good sign ignoring the cramped feel it gave.  We were served w...

I have rated Rasavid Semmencherry 4.0 and the difference is prominent. I have no clue why, but the biriyani here is awful. While rasavid is famous for its biriyani, this branch is nowhere close to the other one.

One of the best Resto's on OMR road.  Rasavid is famous for its Biriyani,so you must taste Biriyani if you are visiting this place. They serve north Indian dishes also,the taste is very good. The ambience of the hotel is not so great. Service is good  Service: 3.5/5 Taste : 4/5 Ambience: 2.5/5 VFH:3.5/5

Ambience: Poor. No proper seating organizations. If you are looking for a comfortable and pleasant dinning this is not the place.  Location: first floor accessible only in foot. Not fornthe elders. Car parking is on service road only and that too subjected to availability.  Food:  Overall all slightly below average.  Starters: Taste is bit different. Can starters are just average. We tried CHICKEN VEPUDU and KOTHIMERE CHICKEN.  Main course: special chicken biryani is the only best thing to try. ...
Ambience was good.  Dishes were decent. But bit costly for the dishes they serve. Atmosphere is a good thing . When u r bored of city life u can try it.
Ambience on point! Food is good, but the service is a little slow. We went here on a Friday noon and the place was bustling with people. Good place for coffee lovers. T

Good food and cool ambience. Outdoor seating is relaxing.  Juice is fresh and no additives. One of few places in Chennai gives this kind of dining. You can hangout with your friends,  have a date,  have discussion on your ideas with your partner... Just good place for everything and you can order anything from the menu.  Don't forget to check out the desert counter.

My favourite place to hang around and I don't mind to travel 20 kms from my place only to visit this place.Its a completely different experience when you visit it in evening. Prices are on a little higher side but that's fine. No complains. It's great! Will be visiting again and again

It's a perfect getaway for the weekend!  If you are searching for a private spot to spend a pleasant evening with your friends/ family, this is the right place to choose.  The beautiful and natural outdoor ambience sets up the right mood for a relaxed evening!  They have a nice range of mocktails and quick bites to munch on, while you spend a memorable time with your loved ones.
Food is great. Ambience is nice. Starters are tasty.  It is a great experience.  The buffet has many different food varieties.  It is reasonably priced.
Wonderful and unique dishes, if compared with other buffet. Serving and interaction with customers is excellent here. If you want to try Mexican style foods, try here.
Different food dishes and best fish !It is best if u go for buffet! There are many dishes ! The ambiance is also very good ! Here there is more sence of privacy!

Ordered two plates of mexicana grilled fish which included rice, beans and potato wedges but I received only the fish without the sides. When I contacted the restaurant the person who answered said that the delivery man had left it behind and washed his hands of the problem. I paid the full amount. Who is responsible for the shirt delivery????

This Is one crazy place ! It has a kickass offer ! Pay 650* and order anything from the menu and any number of times you want ! The fish here ! My god ! It's the best I've ever had ! The seafood is Just extraordinary !

My new favourite hangout spot. Service and ambience is great. Their Money Bags, Stake is among the best I've ever tasted. They have some really decent Crowd ,Decent pricing . The staffs over there are very friendly .Bouncers are good and very kind ..

The service is way tooooo slow .!! The food is overpriced and the quantity is very less and the quality is average.!!! Toooo loud u can't even say a word to ur friends cause u can't hear a thing.!! Overall it's a mediocre place nothing too great abt it.!!
Best location for weekend hangout with friends... Good Ambiance.... Delicious food.... This place is good for both couples and also with friends...
Superb Ambiance, Superb service, Delicious food, perfect place for weekend party.... And DJ is awesome would love to visit more often... Well maintained...
It's an awesome place for hangout in Weekend. Foods are really Yami. Drinks and DJ you will really like. It's nice place for both couples and group of friends. I want to go one more time.....

So we went there for a Friday lunch. They gave a set menu priced at 650 plus taxes.   Heres what they served  Welcome drink chandan cooler or rose Veg clear soup or tomato  Starters  Karare palak chat  Cheese fondue  Paneer kola wada Papadi pizza  Pasta  Main course  Paneer  Mix veg Roti Biryani Dal Jeera rice  Dessert  Rabdi  Ice cream  The food was ok but service was pathetic Manager was extremely rude Waiters had no manners

A restaurant suitable for the middle class people with affordable pricing. The ambience was too good and with the food being served in a traditional styled manner made it worth the money. Food was delicious and the jaljeera especially was too good. All the north Indian dishes were on a different league to be honest. Worth the money and hype
Excellent food and service  Love the sizzlers Briyani chocolate jamun is just awesome 😍❤👌 sizzling brownie 😍 all time favourite 😍 totally I love the food here 😍 excellent service 😍❤

Going to Jalpaan was a split second decision. Today was the first time and based on the feedback from my family, I think it is safe to say we would be going back again. Soon.  We were 4 adults and 2 children. Reached there about 1pm. Place was pretty empty. Only a few tables had people in them  (when we left about 90mins later, there were still many tables empty. Wondered if today was an exception). Wife wanted a corner seating, so we sat away from the crowd at table 1 (I think).  Starters:   B...

Been here a lot of times. The first time was the  best. Starters were yummy. But had a bad experience the last time i vistited. Went for unlimited thali. Got disappointed. The service is way too slow. And all the dishes contained paneer.

Barbeque Nation is one of those places that I've always wanted to visit but never found the right time. When I finally did go, I wasn't disappointed. The starters, which are usually the attraction of grill buffets, was really really good. The main course was so-so and the desserts were quite good. The pseudo-alcohol drinks lessened my experience and I would suggest you don't try them. A good experience overall
First of all service was excellent and prompt Grills and food were tasty too ! Drinks is available too here ... nice Exprience !  Ambience is great

I been to Barbecue Nation, T Nagar, Chennai on 28th May, 2017 with my whole team for which I booked reservation on 3rd May. Paid advance too. But after reaching there on 28th I found out that someone re-schedule my booking to Mumbai branch. It was utter frustration when your team of over 50 people are standing outside and not knowing what next. But somehow they managed and gave us seats and called the wrong re-scheduling as technical glitch.  Now, coming back to food.. Food was ok.. But I was su...
Went there for a team party... Friendly environment...Had a great time with ma team mates.. Food is good actually.. but we expected a lot... not that level....

Sloppy service , had to wait for more than half an hour for second helping of starters. Finally gave up and moved on to main course which wasn't interesting either. Dishes  were not tasty either.  Overall completely disappointed and value for money is very less. Seriously hope the barbecue restaurants in chennai concentrates more on the quality and flavour rather than quatity

Was here for a late afternoon lunch on a sunday afternoon. The place was packed as expected and luckily for us, the wait was not very long.  We went with an assortment of cuisines with prawn crackers, spiced asian BBQ chicken, hot basil chicken cups for starters and spicy ramen bowl for main course to fill our growling tummies. Decide on Watermelon beach and Cranberry Tender coconut to quench our thirst. Only after ordering did we spot a live kitchen for japanese cuisine, setup in a corner of t...

Definitely a place for Pan-Asian delicacies!   The food contains the authentic flavour of each dish and the portion sizes are more than satisfying! The extremely courteous staff add to the vibrant colours of the place lifting the mood up.   They also have live counters (including the beverage section).   Do not miss the chocolate cake, sweet toothed people ~ this cake is not as sweet as you expect it to be. It has a rich touch of cocoa in it and is smoooooooth as hell.   Oh and the dumplings are...

We went to the first ever Momogato restaurant in Chennai @ khader nawaz khan road. The place was cool, had to wait and was mildly disappointed.   We just want to check this out and the ambience turned out to be cool but was crowded.. I mean literally crowded. There should be space between tables and they were arranged too close, space constraint? Otherwise the place was cool with the music, decorations and all.   Service was quite slow, I mean they were too busy but yes, it was on a weekend, so ...

This place has been on my list for long and finally last week we made it. It was a Wednesday eve but the restaurant was quite full. The ambience is amazing, couldn't get too many pics of the place. Food was delicious and the portions are big. I am a big fan of asian food and this place is heaven. Lots of veggie options as well. I'm already planning what to eat the next time. Two things I really liked were the staff who were extremely warm and courteous and the food which was spiced well and deli...

The ambience was perfect for us as a team. It was energetic. The food was simply too good. The staff were hospitable and excellent in their service - it's not easy to please a big group - especially a crazy bunch like ours but they did - Nihar from Tripura & others who waited on us were kind, confident and efficient.

Celebrated my first year anniversary here.  Went for dinner.  Ambiance wise it's not that much great as I noticed unclean (not dirty though) floor.   Food wise it's awesome. Ordered French fries, Chocolate Overdose, Choco Banana Shake, Red velvet jar. All tasted very good 👌. Quantity 👎   Quick service. 👍  Parking available and spacious. 👍  Would visit again !!! 😊

This place is one of the coolest cafes I've been to.. the ambiance is interesting and their quirky way of serving food is definitely making its way into your snapchat story...but coming to the main part- it leaves a burning hole in your pocket... its food is definitely not worth the price... I had OMG here, which is like a huge bowl full of ice cream, brownie and whipped cream.. it was AMAZING... Not really planning to visit this place again...

One of the best places to go if you're craving chocolate and a good place to hang out! There's not much to say about their ambience. Pretty average place but they make up for it with their amazing chocolate treats. Their chocolate quality is amazingly good. All their chocolate stuff like chocolate fudge or chocolate cakes are all amazingly good. Especially the dark chocolate pot de creme is a must have for dark chocolate lovers. Creamy and bitter sweet! The rest of the menu is pretty average so ...

Amazing cafe at Nungambakkam.  Felt like trying everything on the menu..that wasn't possible :P..so, I tried out Chicken Lasagne, Lemon Fish and That Tiny Little Chocolate Cake. All three were absolutely perfect and definitely the best in Chennai. The ambience is good, though not the best. I will definitely be visiting again!

Sandy's !!! I really wanted to visit this place for long time , and we ended here after a lunch at late 4 !! I loved the hazelnut chocolate jar !! Great desserts and I loved the place !!! ❤️❤️❤️. Sure shot place for dessert lovers !!!
I generally love Pan Asian food in general,and this is one of my favourite places..There bao's are very nice... friendly staff and funky decor..This place is a must for pan asian lovers!
Have been wanting to come to this place from the time, I came know about Va Pho... And finally I got to chance to come here...the ambiance is stunnning as well the food.....loved the megorang....
The mocktails and soup which has been served very quick made be feel good and the taste of food here is okay and this is best for the party place

We wanted to celebrate a friend's birthday here and felt the choice of place was great. Nice quirky ambience with fun stuff up on the wall. They also had board games to play if people chose to. Food was good, service was quite quick. We ordered some mocktails, a soup, some starters and noodles and rice for main course. The crispy bbq mushroom bao was my favourite. Well made and delicious. Tai chin with baby potatoes was yumm too. The pineapple jasmine rice was a favourite too. Overall it was a p...

The place had a very lively ambience which made it very noisy, but the good type of noisy of chatter and music. Got a table for 8 with no difficulty since we had made a booking. Coming to the menu..  We had a whole load of beverages.. fuzzy peg.. royal madras.. iced coffee and Rangoon princess. Each of them tasted exactly like their description and they were excellent. Iced coffee was the best. The starters we tried were beef satay (average), golden triangle(good), grilled mushroom(excellent), c...
Awesome ambience. Great taste and good hospitality.  Decent varities of food. Best restaurant for vegetarian foodies ... pani puri is the ultimate of all.
One more nice buffet place with an impressive spread on offer. Had a nice time with a few office colleagues at this place, and the prices were quite decent.

Ambience and service is superb......  Food is average... .  Not that punjabi authentic Nd they r very much scared using salt in the food!!!!   Overall good to go..... Watelse do u get better in chennai!!
Loved it,Best veg food had ever..the style of serving the glasses the ambience is beyond great...i relished the taste..finger licking paneer and bhindi fry...

"1200 Reviews on Zomato and still maintaining 4/5 rating". That's something that urges you to book a table.   LOCATION (3/5): It is trickily placed. For best identification, place yourself at Velachery Vijayanagar Bus Stand. With Velachery railway station and PVR(Grand Mall) on to your right, see towards the direction of diagonally left. You will see MCRENNETT and GANGA SWEETS. The street(1st Main Road) adjacent to it will lead you to PIND. (You have dedicated Car parking space. Bikes have to be...
The best value for money chinese/thai cuisine in chenni hands down. The quality of the noodles was really good. A must try for chinese/thai food lovers.

Been to Orange Wok for dinner on a friend's suggestion. Little cozy place it is.  Ordered Veg Corn Soup, Veg Manchow soup. One of the best soups I have tasted in Chennai.  We followed up with a couple of starters - Crispy Fried Vegetables and Shanghai Potato with sauces. More than decent.  For main course, we went with Khao Phad (my favourite ) and Guay Twie which is basically flat rice noodles. Everyone loved Khao Phad. Friends found Guay Twie a bit spicier but I loved it. We ordered a Sapo Cot...

Orange wok - visited this place after such a long wait and it was never a disappointment. Went there for casual lunch and I absolutely fell in love with the taste. The squid starter, my most loved Thai curry and wontons made my day. Waiting to visit again and would.high recommend people who love south asian/Thai food.

Visited this place on a Saturday evening based on recommendations from zomato. Despite it being crowded, the service was top notch. The staff were knowledgeable and gave relevant suggestions to make the ordering a pleasant experience.  Our order : Dragon Chicken, Chicken Tai Pai, American Chopsuey and Mamma Mia (Beverage)  The starters were pretty decent. I especially loved Chicken Tai Pai. The problem was that some of the dishes were way sweeter than they should be. American Chopsuey tasted mor...

First of all there is yet another Branch of Orange Work which is on OMR, do visit that too if you get time. Coming back to this Branch, these are my opinions about the place.  1. Ambience: 3/5. Nice place with gud colour scheme inside, small place from inside with around 10 tables. 2. Food Quality: 4.5/5. Great Quality Food. I tried Noodles and some starters which were really good. 3. Price: 5/5. The food you will eat is value for money because of the quality and quantity they give in the amount...

Nice place to try chettinad and andhra cuisine .. we ordered Guntur Kodi and Gobi manchurian for starters .. eral thokku  uthappam, poondu dosa with nethili kolambu, couple of nallennai dosa, plain uthappam and veg fried rice .. the best of these were poondu dosa with nethili gravy combo and gobi Manchurian .. Guntur Kodi was basically made of green chili paste and on spicier side .. but can try once for it's unique taste .. service was prompt .. order took a bit long to arrive .. ambience is go...

Authenticity, variety and flavour – Annalaya scores high on all of these. The service is spot on. Crisp golden dosas, idlis are as light as air, and the chicken briyani here never disspoints. The servers are always courteous and the place also has North Indian and Chinese food on the menu. A must visit place :)

Loved the food here. The ambience is classy! The service was good as well, and the variety in their menu is a real boost when you go with a large group of people. Prices are moderate! Another advantage of this place is that the parking space is huge, so you will never have a problem even when you go with a large group in multiple cars. A must try and among the best in the Nungambakkam area.

Annalaya is the perfect place for non veg south indian food lovers. The restaurant has awesome chicken, fish, crab, prawn dishes which will be a great miss if u have not tried them yet. A very pocket friendly restaurant with some mouth watering food. A place worth visiting with family and friends.
Really good place for fellow foodies who love Indian style cuisine. This place has really good chetinadu food too. Combine that with a chill peaceful ambience and thats annalaya :)
The Italian Food Items are Okay in Taste and I choose Burger to eat here , The Interior and Lightening is Something Great to tell about the Double Roti
A good place, a fan of the deserts. The starters and main course aren't worth the prices. It is expensive for such kind of food. Service need to be improved to attract people.
Really nice café with an amazing ambience and comfortable seating. The shakes and burgers on offer are really filling and deliciously yummy.

Good location, great work with the interiors. The nachos and fries are a nightmare. But those are the only weak aspects of the menu. Their burgers are a delight and at times, overwhelming. If starting with their small bites/starters gives you second thoughts about coming back here, the finishing touch of desserts make sure all such thoughts are abolished! Their Choco mud is something to die for! Refreshingly different theme

Double roti..... They have many outlets in chennai  Having nice ambience and service is good  Loved the red velvet cake..... It's the best till date ........... People should try out this place and u will be definitely satisfied with the food they give ...... Above average .....

Came here for buffet for 2nd time and absolutely loved it. They have amazing veg starters: personal favourites are Chilly potatoes and Gobi manchurian. Even the corn Broccoli rice is nice to have but I didn't like the Veg Biryani much. Even the desserts were good.  The staff were friendly too and would love to visit this place again.

Very tasty dishes.. both veg and non veg are awesome.. taste and service was good.. especially I loved that egg biriyani, fish wada, elaneer payasam and chicken Tikka.. worth the money.. 👍 wenever I go forum mall am gonna visit this place 😍  Service 4.5/5 Food 5/5 Ambience 4/5

Though I had an eye for this restaurant quite a while, Visit to this place was accidental. When we were searching for a yet to try dinner spot in forum mall, we entered SALT. First came the soup, which was pretty decent and tasty. And the veg platter that followed with prompt service surprised me. But then came a bit of a disappointment... We had ordered the main course with the starter and had...

Its one place we make it a point to visit atleast once in every two months.... Awesome food, nice ambience and exceptional hospitality :-)  Everytime we try a new dish and it turns out to be good.  Some of their best items include Nahari nalli, railway chicken curry, chatpata kebabs and ya....how can i forget their Awadi biryani..i wud suggest they maintain the Awadhi biryani as part of their daily menu options instead of reserving it only for the weekends as is being done rite now. Salt is a decent restaurant in forum mall.compared to the food court and other eat outs in forum mall,this one is more spacious and has better ambiance.Food is not bad and they dnt make u wait for food.The staffs there are very courteous too. Ambiance :5/5 Taste:4.5/5 Cost and quantity  :4/5

Food, service, ambience, presentation -everything was perfect! The best dessert place I have been to. Will surely come back here:) the red carpet is a must try. Perfect place for a late night snack, family outing, date night, call it what you want but visit this place:)
Nice place this! Very cute and some really innovative waffle innovation on offer here. The overall experience was nice and will come back to try more.
The food over here is too good. What disappointed me was the service. Hope they improve on that. Overall, the best place to have waffles. The ambience is great.

I am so glad to have found waf o bel. I love waffles, have always preferred just the good old maple syrup. Then i came across waf o bel, with such variety of toppings, i just had to give it a try. And man was i impressed.  The place could be a little hard to find.  Well lit interiors and service was excellent I ordered the dream team after good reviews about it in zomato. Hubby went for cool banana.  I was so impressed with the presentation, the dedication for each plate was clearly seen. Felt r...

Its been a long time I felt like giving 5/5 to a resto :)  Have been hearing about dis place a LOTTT but yesterday only got time to visit. Food was incredible. My expectations were high but they satisfied us to every bit possible. We tried Red velvet waffle and creamy mushroom pockets both were lip smacking dishes.   Great interior, courteous staff and off course the food :* A must try place. Little heavier side on pocket but kabhi kabhi chlta h :P
I have been to plamshore many times, and impressed by the food served so decided to have a bday party, food was amazing but hotel service was just below average.
They have maintained consistency in their food quality n taste .. I will always prefer Palmshore if I have to choose one from Ashok Nagar ..Must try Momos ,Thai fried rice,Pomphret fish .

Anything for this bowl of Haleem 😍  This place serves great Arabian food with the Arabian kind of seating booths and serves shisha as well! Pucca Arabian like one of those restaurants in Dubai and serves amazing haleem!
Ordered iftar combo from here was surprised by the variety of dishes in the combo and the taste was so good too for a price tag of 235 its reali worth it and must try!

Where : palmshore Ashoknagar Order : 1 shawarma , 1 rose falooda Cost : shawarma ₹90/- , rose falooda ₹180/- Experience : disappointed The shawarma was decent, the falooda was a waste of money, for ₹180 I got a pink slush in a plastic tumbler..the fruits weren't fresh, more than 2/3 rds of the drink was made of a tasteless gelatinous substance.. I ve had great faloodas at 150.. this was the worst falooda I ve had in recent times..

~ Critic to the point ~  General order : Weekend Breakfast buffet.  Pros : Overall quality of food, friendly staff, Ambience.  Cons : None other than the 150% increase in buffet cost over a year & a half.  Can be better : Earlier, bacon used to be on the buffet counter & part of the buffet which was a great hit! Now, it's just made to order & quantity is extremely low & waiters hardly bring it on time. More outlets near Anna Nagar or some where this side of town.

Went to this place for morning breakfast. They have a breakfast buffet which has a decent spread out of French cuisine for the price. The sandwich was good but a bit dry. The baked veggies were really good. Pancakes were delicious. But the pastries were not satisfying. Overall it was a good experience

Neat place. Another place that I would want to try breakfast at. Assorted Bruschetta platter was nice. Peri Peri Pork chops did not really hit the spot as the meat was dry. Fillet Mignon got an ok from my European friend. Fusilli Jalapeno Cream pasta was nice. What struck me most was the presentation of the food. Take a bow L'ammandiers
Good spread, apt for people desiring Continental breakfast. Eased out  ambience, and Swift service. Dishes were alright, nothing extra ordinary but satisfying experience .

The food and the ambience was good. I particularly liked the mac n cheese, while it was one of the best I've had, mashed potato were the worst iv ever had. The staff were hospitable and friendly. Service was prompt except the food took too much time to arrive. Location was a plus point for me.

First of all ws d ambience the best place to sit nd eat peacefully wit a waterfall surroundingzz whc givez yu a new feel one of the best place with affordable price in vadapalani moreover v ll hav a nice xperience while eatng good stress reducer restaurant ❤️THE WATERFALL❤️abt food not tat much it's gud wit really affordable price😉✌🏼

Waterfall - a themed restaurant It was a bit difficult to locate this place as it is in the middle of a semi-residential area. Now.coming to the food we were 2 of us so we opted to go with a starter,main course. We ordered  1- chilly paneer (was made nicely n came out exactly as i tld him to make) - 4.5/5 2- paneer tikka masala( i just loved its  it was a mix of north Indian n south indian recipe.never tasted it before) - 4.8/5 3 - naan ( was not good,below average, i judge a restaurant mainly o...

Dal makhni is a must have. And ,so is phulka for light meal preferences. Baby corn fries were exceptional too. Very serene atmosphere and sound of water falls is good as a background for dinner. Yellow lighting sets the mood too. Must visit.
Had to wait for long time....main course was horrible... only veg andhra meal was good. Ambience was good. Taste of dishes other than andhra ones was bad.

My friend suggested me this restaurant for lunch and I agreed instantly seeing reviews on Zomato. Decently lit themed restaurant. One can enjoy their food with the sight and sound of a waterfall. Ambience is very good and the staff are well behaved. We had hot and sour soup which was good. Not too hot and not too sour. It had the right proportions. We ordered golden fried baby corn for starters and I absolutely loved it. Unlike most of the restaurants where they serve babycorn bajji when you ord...
Been here with my team for lunch... Experience was good... Taste, quality n service was really good... Enjoyed the noon with team n good food !!

I ordered for a basa fish taste was awesome ,next time i try mutton haleem here . Ganesh service was very good and helpful person .... thank u bye .................................................................................

I wanted to send Haleem to a friend in Chennai... Tried many restaurants but they refused... I called up Karthik at Palmshore... He was excellent... Very flexible... I paid via Paytm and within 15 minutes the order was dispatched... True representation of best service... Please keep up the good work... Food review will be shared by my friend... Will request her to do the same..
Ganesh was our server and we had an amazing experience in the restaurant. Food was great. Had an amazing time with family. Definitely will come here again.

Very poor taste.Soup was like gum.totay lost appetite aftr having the soup.then dargon chicken was ok.nd fried rice was bit salty ,biriyani was ok and haleem was fine. drinks were ok not much difference in variety.totally 5 members and cost was around 2k which s definitely waste of money.

The place is just amazing. My fiancee took me there for my birthday lunch and we had a great time there. The ambience is very good. We sat at the cocktail bar which is an outdoor seating and has a bar at the background. The weather was also good  at the time. It's the perfect setting to relax and have a lazy afternoon.  We ordered a Thai chicken satay and a chicken kebab for starter, both of which were very good. The cocktails we ordered were one of the best I've had- grape mojito, a mango cockt...

Wonderful ambience and hospitality, awesome food , specially soups and starters, great place to visit with family, friends or anyone special ! A great place to have lunch or dinner if you traveling to Chennai!

Very lovely place and atmosphere....  I am vegetarian so not tasted any food there only lime soda and milk shakes I use to have there....  Very nice place in the evening "Thandi Hawayien leharati aayien"😍

Excellent setup and ambience for a romantic dinner, fun 'n frolic with friends or to impress your business colleagues. Good selection of spirit concoctions to have you tipsy and add to the fun. Limited food menu, but suits the set up and the spot on plating makes it more enjoyable. I won't say it's lip smacking but would confirm that it's more suited to the expat taste buds, a tad less spicy (bland).  Overall a chic place to have good evening with loved ones, friends or colleagues.

Excellent ambience but extremely poor service . The waiter was pre occupied and failed to note down any of the orders. Issued the bill without serving the main course which was ordered and also got the order wrong everytime. Disastrous experience. Such a good place needs to invest more on providing quality service to customers. Highly disappointed.

Went to this place about 1 week ago. I ordered veg buffet. The waiter was keep on asking about how is the food....once in every 10 mins. He wants me to say the word EXCELLENT for everything inclusive of his creepy behaviour !!  The starters was tasty. Thought of eating roti naan with some gravy. Overall I'd give a 7 out of 10. Their desert counter needs a serious improvement in terms of options, for the price they charge. For ice creams they've got  e plain vanilla and strawberry for options.  The kulfi counter and the Indian deserts were good. One thing I'm glad of xD  The service was really slow at the beginning an we were left hungry for a good 20 mins.   Not much seafood option in the main course

Had an excellent experience at dinner tonight at BBQ Nation, Vadapalani. Called in the evening to make a table booking and it was handled professionally. With regard to the food, the starters are just too good. A variety of veg n non veg starters are placed on the live grill kept in the middle of your table. They keep getting refills until you ask them to stop by lowering the flag kept on the table. The main course too is decent with a good spread of veg and non veg items. The dessert section al...

Visited yesterday for lunch with my friend and had a grt time.... food,service and ambience all were pleasing.. had a grt time I couldn't remember the server name he was sooo pleasing checking with all time..... visit back and definitely recommend others

In love with place. If you are a fan of buffet , I say there's no better choice than BBQ nation. The service here was extravagant. They were so kind. I often visit the place with my friends and family and I find no better place to spend a quality time .  The food ( both veg and non veg) is just perfect and they also adjust the spice levels according to our wish. The price is worth the taste. I feel everyone must try this place .  Review: Food -4.5/5 Service - 5/5 Ambience -4/5

So much hype !! And you are just so tempted to go ... that's the case with nasi and mee ! Surprisingly it did stand up to the hype !! I'll be honest I went with already pre determined order list 😂 and Trust me it was a treat ...   First up their famous iced milo - perfect ! There is no descripti...

This is the first place in Chennai that I've visited that I needed to wait so long for a table for two, but it was definitely worth the wait.   The atmosphere is adorably hipster and chic and although a little small and noisy because of the open kitchen, it's a great place to grab lunch with a group of friends.  I started with a sweet and sour soup and I'm not usually a fan but I just couldn't get enough of this one. Next we had the sambal prawns and although the portion was adequate for two of...

Dropped in with family for my granny's b day and I must say that I do not regret the call. Fabulous stuff. Located in KNK Rd in Nungambakkam, this place has got valet parking, so no trouble for parking. Fortunately we had reserved our seats and my sister had gone to take up our seats as we were getting a little delayed. Very good food and service .....keep it up Good place for come with the group of family  We love to come again for specially tandoori kababs and dum biryani and last Amritsari kulfa

Horrible dinner at Bombay brasserie today! Probably the first place, where I walked out before ordering main course. I am not sure of the exact reason , but I felt more than content after having the starter. I have worked with the filing elephant as their party photographer. It is a good place with proper security for partying. Loved working there.. Been here during Italian fest.  Ambience was good,  but we felt but hot may be due the weather or warm soup we had. The mushroom starter  actually its side was good. They also offer course of set menu. It's worth trying.

The flying elephant is a part of park Hyatt hotel. While we were staying here we visited the restaurant for dinner. Ambience is absolutely beautiful and luxurious. Dropped in with a hungry stomach after work with friend. As the place is much hyped for good food it keeps the name. Nasi goreng has being all time TFE favourite and added suspense is the newly launched Italia menu. Buffalo mozzarella and mushroom pizza was just scrumptious and could not resist myself continuing to bite it even if I was full. Tarak made the dinner perfect with his warmth and service. Kudos to the team !!

This place has been in my wishlist for a long time and finally made it few days back. Went on a Tuesday night for dinner and still the place was full. One of my favorite restaurant in Adyar. This place never disappoints me.Been there 'n' number of times.I have recommended to many of my friends,my family and colleagues. Located at the main junction of Adyar, one of the best themed restaurant! ☺️ The first theme restaurant I've ever been to is this. 👆🏻  Car parking done at owner's risk at the parking lot outside the hotel building!  ☹️  Delicious menu, excellent service, amazing ambience! 😍  I have been here so many times with my friends. Went on a weekday evening. Booked a table in advance for 12-14 people. The restaurant is placed in the underground. The ambience resembled to that of a forest. But I almost had all the dishes ordered by my friends. The tandoori chicken was good, served with a tangy sauce. The American choupsey was extremel...

Worst service. They refused to remove a bottle of water from the bill just because they had already printed the bill.. they are ready to lose a customer over 25rs water bottle. We had a great  lunch  here... Kannan service  was good... Enjoyed well.. Well satisfied with our lunch :) :)  hope will come again soon..... :)
Great food. Late night delivery . What else we need? i am a fan of their Oreo milkshake :)  The shawarma is great. One of the best joints in Ramapuram

Been here a couple Of times for lunch. It's located opposite DLF it park.  The ambience is decent. And food is great.  Dishes I would recommend here are - Paneer butter Masala, Honey chilli potato, Paneer Tikka. The prices are moderate.   Food 4/5 Service 4/5 Ambience 3.5/5
I have ordered Tandoori chicken and it was perfect just PERFECT . Reasonable delivery time. Tasty food. Love it. Keep up the good work Palmshore.

I was craving for seafood so ordered from palmshore Poonamallee. The food did arrive on time but the quality and quantity was very bad. Ambience - neat and light Service - nothing extraordinary Food - tasted good.... But these cafés have goto to start serving their meals fresh! A lovely place for a good classy meal. The ambience is calm and classy. We had the BBQ glazed chicken sausages, jamaican chicken grill and gooey chocolate shake. I'd say, they have nailed the bbq chicken. I have not been a huge fan of it because in most places they tend to mess up the balance of the sweet and spice. But this place has got it just right. This is my regular joint. Food is always tasty specially the palak paneer with butter naans. I recommend this to everyone who want to enjoy the tasty food.
Sharwama is very nice in this place and i tried chinese fried rice and they are very good , decor and lighting is perfect and the service is okay

Suprising this place is rated so high. Went for team lunch after seeing such a high rating. Disappointed to see the place very congested . They have valet parking which is a plus point.
