Won't recommend this place for buffet atleast.

'COPPER' Kitchen..... So were the bowls in which the Biriyanis were served.. had been here a couple of times and both the times didn't regret for being here.. Bbq tiger prawn😍, the starter worth trying here.  Chicken n sea food is good too.. But never ever mis the strong DANCING GRAPE juice here.. A small suggestion: serving food in copper plates would change the class of your restaurants,  I know its a draggy process, but i think that will work.. atleast once a week and on some good occasion...

Copper Kitchen in Porur junction next to Chennai Le Palace on Arcot Road is a very good restaurant for Arabian & Indian food. We ordered tossed salad it was real green salad ever had in Madras with olives and lettuce . Calamari pepper was also very good. Iranian grilled chicken was the best.over all food was good.  Try their Mutton chops Its also very tasty any yummy. Chicken shawarma is also good. Restaurant is clean & neat including the toilets maintained.

Best place to visit with friends... One of the best themed restaurants in chennai it's located in adayar.... Iam big fan of their dessert eg.. Caramel custard and elanir payasam...

If u want to have diabetes you should come here. Every item on the menu is sweet.  We ordered 4 to 5 starters all were sweet. Hot and sour soup was also sweet.  After having those incredibly sweet food we couldn't go for main course, so i don't knw whether it is good or bad.  Had sweet lime soda which was too salty.  In the end only fruit salad with ice cream saved the day.

Great BUFFET ON BUDGET place .  They serve more than enough starters on table and we couldn't even went to Main course , as we were filled by starters itself <3  So , we went on with the desserts - they were ok .  Ambience was bit cramped to my preference ...  Service was normal ..  but for the pricing it's really a good deal :-)

A nice place to have your meal amidst animals in a jungle setup!!  They offer a fantastic buffet at a perfectly acceptable price. Awesome food, and polite staff. The service was a bit off though when it was packed, however, it got better once the place started to get empty. We ordered a pizza to start with. Good food. Suraj provided a good service, nice and timely. AC can be better  thanks. Good ambience. Nice variety of  veg flavours. Would visit again

I wanted to try a sizzler at this place so made up my mind to visit this place for a Sunday lunch. Highly recommend this place! The ambience and service was good.. food was great! we ordered cheese garlic bread, Sizzling chicken with schezwan and garlic sauce, Kobe special chicken sizzler, sizzling brownie with ice cream. Finest dining and ambience is pleasant and good  love the food and my favourite is paneer platter which is chef's special and i love it. Fills up my tummy completely and worthy too. Did not try non veg. But everything else is good in here. Service is a bit lacking here otherwise its all good

I can refer this restro for veg. I had a gud food nice ambience and service was good and my favourite food attached below. U can park ur vehicle without worry..

A 5/5 review speaks for itself.  It's a vegetarian paradise. A house refurbished to make a restaurant and has been done up so well.  Service stands out. Cheeseeee.. Briyanniiii... And Chocolate....   3 of my most favourite food.. all in one place.. Ohhh., Still can't stop drooling over the cheese and chocolate.. Top class.. The most satisfying meal ever.. Yummyy and Happyy Tummyyy..

Food is good but tax too much for 2600 bill they are putting tax of 750 . Please try to change it .you must be resonable with pricing it sound too much tax is too much

I am a big fan of Nando's.. Not just here in India but also outside. Like any other outlet, this one too has maintained its standard. It was a night time when we entered the restaurant, As we're hungry we ordered the buffet. the horrible thing they were making us to wait for a long time. From the first, starting, the soup to the last,deserts everything is worst.This restaurant  become first the worst restaurant I have visited in my life.

Positives : + @ the quietest part of gandhinagar adayar + No issues in finding parking  +Has been around awhile , it's past owners were famous  + we were the first to arrive so we had the attention of the head waiter. + Coconut suffle    Negatives  - I came in with a party of 12 from the moment I stepped into the waiting area my antennas were going up... I got a clear feeling that the restaurant was struggling . The waiting area though decorated looked uncared for . And somehow the theme  wasn't...

Have been to this place a long long ago and still have a pleasant memories of my earlier visit. Ordered a table for 12 thru Zomato and got the confirmation. When we reached they informed they didn't get any info from Zomato. Not sure who's fault. However, they arranged tables as there wasn't much crowd.   Ambience: this place definitely requires repainting or at least paint job near the wash area. Seats are bad. Not comfortable.  Service: Awfully pathetic. We asked for buffet or set menu and the...
WE HAD A SMALL FAMILY GET TOGETHER HERE AND ALL OF US HAD A WONDERFUL TIME. THE FOOD WAS EXTREMELY GOOD . THE SERVICE WAS ALSO VERY GOOD. STAFF WERE VERY ACCOMMODATING
It was a good experience to have a great food in this hotel with good hospitality and good taste and ambience was good and price was reasonable
Great ambience with great food for the hunger... refreshing with good music 😍👌 love the food ❤😍 and perfect service 😍❤ the theme is just osm😀😎😍
Completely satisfied. Tiranga tikka panneer and Gobi Manchurian were damn good. Had stuffed naan, schezwan fried rice and biriyani too. None of them disappointed. Pleasant atmosphere.

Firstly, it's the first veg themed restaurant that I have ever visited. The ambience was wow! Food: Too much of cheese..Just Cheese! The taste was good not best. Service: Excellent, as we did not wait too much. Dislikes: Too much noise Charged 600/- for service (service charge Customization was not up to the expectations Highly priced dishes

A theme based restaurant near Cathedral road, all the way coming from Kolkata :) Very well known place and the restaurant is beautifully designed taking up the theme on every aspect - the seating, the staff - their uniform. Food - all the dishes have got a unique taste which is rarely found these days. Ordered 4 types of paneer for this sole reason and every dish justified to its description. Their mocktails are also prepared with the right blends of flavours which is a must try :) Food - 5/5 Am...

Good points first :  The food was very good and the service was also good. Had ordered smokey BBQ for starters which was decent. For main course we ordered Amritsari kulche which was nice and churchur naan which was excellent. Lahori paneer was good too.   Decor is different n interesting. The lighting is very dim, which I don't actually prefer.   The negative is cleanliness. Saw 2 cockroaches running on the table. This is a totally no no.  Not acceptable.   Would definitely give it 3/3.5 rating...

Delightful experience for a foodie like me. It was a family occasion and I didn't have the mood to concentrate much on the food , but Madras Pavilion took me by surprise !!!!! Their taste is gonna be a long term memory stored in my T- buds 😍😍  Ambience:  👑 Rich 👑. Of course that's the only word u can use to comment on their ambience.   Food : Starters were stunning though few in number. But they have a main buffet spread so huge . The ones that caught my heart were Thai style Chicken...
Went to this place for a special occasion and ended up having a great time. The food and presentation was great, and so was the décor and service.

If one wants to enjoy the authentic flavours of Madras I'd recommend this restaurant, I was there for the breakfast nd I enjoied my food to the core, their vadas and idlis served with chutney, sambhar, and variety of podis with variety of oils were the best, the freshly made dosas were crispy and delicious, no more words to describe this restaurant, if there is some thing to rate more than five stars this restaurant would definitely deserve it.
Great buffet and ambience but the service and hospitality is simply out of the world.  Loved the salads and desserts. Not a lot of options for veg starters though.  Buffet is 2300/- all inclusive.

Exemplary buffet with variety of dishes from various cuisines. Must try for all the foodies out there. Worthy of the price you pay for it. Known for it's largest buffet in Chennai. Went there for My Girl's birthday lunch. It was nice of them to serve us with the complimentary birthday cake. The cake was delicious too.

GOT HARASSED WITH OUR OWN MONEY.   We ordered Mysore masala dosa and Bisibille bath. The masala in the dosa was not bad. The bath was tasteless as it was not well cooked. The Service is really bad. The waiters there are part time goons who work there. Terrorize the customers. The waiter there threatened to hit us as a token of their service towards customers. Ever more when we complained to the Manager there, he brushed it off saying we will take action and never for once summoned the waiter or ...

Went there recently for lunch. The restaurant has ample car parking. The wait time to get a table can take a while since it is crowded all the time.  We had the Udupi spl. meals, Garlic naan, Dal Makhani, Paneer Butter masala, Veg Lasagna, Golconda Handi Biryani. The Udipi SPL. meals was very good and something different, it had kadubu, need dosa, bisibelabath, Mysore Bonda and Rasa Vada everything tasted good.  The Garlic naan was good but size small compared to other restaurants for the money ...

Had Udupi Platter with my ofyc colleagues.Udupi Platter contains 3 types of rice ,3 types of Dosa, Kuzhi panniyarams, 1  idli  and Rasam Vada.Taste was OK .I felt Rice items can be served better with good taste.Taste of Sambhar and Chutney needs improvement.

This place is a life saver! It's open till 1:30am so you can head there for a late dinner. And even at 1:30 in the night, you will have to wait 10-15 mins to get a table! Its that crowded.  The food is good, service was quick as well.   Food 4/5 Ambience 3.5/5 Service 4/5

I'll turn up here whenever I felt to have Dhal fry + Steam rice! At mid night though! Specialty of this shop, everything they bought to serve to eat will be so hot(Except Cold water and deserts) 😜, probably we should borrow🌬 killer frosts power to deal with it. Anything you order, they will serve with steam on it, what a quality and priceworth for it. You will have such a decent ambient and chairs to have good food. #Peace

The food that Padrino offers , is  one which you can't refuse (See what I did there *wink*) !   Padrino is definitely the 'in' place for the young , chic Chennai-ites. The setting is really nice with an option of indoor and outdoor seating, and is sort of a homage to all things related to the movie 'The Godfather' , with references of his mafia spread all over the restaurant.  Service is amazing. The manager (I think ?) gives every table his attention and the waiters are efficient !  We ordered ...

This place never disappoints !!  Big fan of the drinks and the massive size of pizzas . The gelato can be a lil light in texture but it certainly tastes amazing . Wish the place was a bit bigger as it gets crowded and very noisy . The soups and burgers get a big thumbs up too .

♧ Location- (5/5) ♧Ambience-(5/5) ♧Options- (5/5) ♧Food- Starter(3/5), Main Course(4/5), Dessert(5/5) ♧Service- (5/5)  Enjoyed a quiet meal on a Tuesday afternoon with a delicious pizza and a huge scoop of gelato(nutella), which is to die for! Must visit for all those pizza lovers !

This place was a get-together spot for my friends and they invited me to join them. The decor is just amazing and the touch and feel of the place is just colourful...... The food is exceptional..... No traditional foods at all... Complete continental servings only... The variance in pizza's is just mouth watering to even pronounce..... Absolutely enjoyed every minute there....... The dishes are authentic and true to heir origin..... The prices are a bit steep... But completely value for both qua...

I had been with my girl friends too this place for lunch..the place was done up well with good service from the staff..they also have a good choice of pizzas..the 30 inch pizza is a must try...lovely thin crust pizza with less cheese makes it really delicious..the peri peri brushcetta r a must try...a whole lot of green teas which is a must try again.. overall a good place for quick lunch and worth ur money

Awesome location just at the Besant nagar beach. Favorite place to grab a bite. Pros: 1.Cant ask for a better location inside Chennai city. Just overlooking the Bay of Bengal. Its an open shack kind of place with low walls in first floor. Its a small set up but worth visiting again and again 2.Food tastes alright there are a few items which are good rest are average but its worth for the experience 3.Very pocket friendly 4.Quantity is good enough one portion for one person Personal favorites: 1....

Great food. Had chicken sizzler which was served with mushroom pepper sauce which was too good. Also, desserts were amazing. Tried the sizzling choco mudpie and brownie fudge sundae. Both were great. The staff was friendly. A great place overall. Would love to visit again.

This is one my favorite place all time. Been visiting since 2012. One of best place to chill with friends. My favorite dish is chicken sizzlers. I highly recommend you try it worth the money.   Food 4.5/5 service 3.5/5 ambiance 3.5/5 value for money 4/5 overall 4/5
Good food and swift service. Can't forget the taste of mushroom pepper sauce which they usually serve with their  sizzlers. Also have decent desserts to choose from

Delicious Food... Desserts are to Die for ... Great service... Had amazing Time there ... Only drawback small space ... Otherwise best place to hangout with your friends... Great location as well.. exactly opposite to beach 🌊...
Awesome biryani I hv tasted never miss to taste it if Ur here.... Vera level.... No match fr this taste around the city. With affordable price Bt parking is little issue here.

As my frnds and many reviewers suggested that this is the best place to eat Briyani. So I decided to have a taste of this. I googled and took my bike and  reached  YA MOIDEEN  restaurant  in GST road. The place was good nice ambience. Went upstairs and saw ppl were standing in queue. To my surprise my mind has reached foodgasmic. Thinking we gonno eat a nice tasty briyani.     Then I took a parcel it was around 200rs. Went back home and unwrapped my 200rs briyani. Had my first handful of rice it...
Ambience is good... More than 6 members can't be able to sit under a single.... Parcel wouldn't be available at late night... Have to wait a little longer...

Small eatery shop located in Pallavaram....very good taste!!! :-) One of the finest briyani in Chennai city.They won't provide seating facility..Standing in long Q for an hour & tasting this mouth watering briyani ..I assure you that feel is priceless

One of the best biriyanis i ever had! Too good. Courteous staff. Meat is well cooked. Always better to be early as the place gets VERY crowded soon. And of course the parking does receive a special mention. Was worried where to park in the crowded GST road and luckily they have their parking spot before the restaurant which is a boon!!

Had been here thrice. In my first visit I tried half baked cake with ice cream.. I ordered for bean vanilla but after billing they said that vanilla was over so I was recommended some other flavour.. It was terribly sweet. Second time I tried coco cake which was good. In my third visit I tried Twix cake with a vanilla scoop.. It was also terribly sweet. Personally I didn't like their cakes and ice creams as all were so sweet. Ambience was good.. Strictly for sweet tooth..

BEST ICE CREAM I HAVE EVER HAD!  It keeps the flavors true to their source. Tastes fresh and genuine. I would gladly drive 6 hours to have this ice cream. Always been loyal to Hail Mary, since I rarely get a chance to come here.   Would love to try the s'mores but never been available :(  Thanks for the sharing the love for ice cream with all of us! ... I mean that :)
Awesome ice cream and sorbets. Always enjoyed going to this place and tasting the latest flavours. Something new to taste every time. Highly recommend to anyone who likes Ice cream and desserts.

The best dessert place in chennai💯 Have tried almost everything on the menu!  Love all their flavours ;caramelised white chocolate, trifle pudding, maamis filter coffee to name a few. Love their ice cream cakes , icecream cookie sandwich and sundaes too❤️ And Chicken 62 is my favourite from their sandwich menu :D  Their waffle cones are freshly baked, crisp and absolutely delicious 😍 . The pricing is on the higher side and is totally worth it because of the amazing quality of icecreams...

Sorbet, ice cream, ambience.. hit this place buy those Sorbet it's just that wow factor makes me want to go again and again. Ambience presentable.. poor parking space with valet parking option . But you can't say any bad review about the ice cream and the sorbets . If you are reading this please just go and taste it .!

Excellent dining experience.food was amazing.had winglets in chettinad style... simply fell in love with it.And butter marinated steak (sorry forgot the names...so jus naming the ingredients) was yummy and peri peri steak was lil spicy but good.Had ginger beer which also had amazing mix of mint flavour.Desset...dark chocolate cake - out of world taste.Total bill Rs.1200...Worth for money.(sry.no pics...since we were very hungry) Ambience - 4.5/5 Staffs- 5/5(patiently explains about the dish)

Simply fantastic. The taste keeps lingering because all their dishes are high in flavour and cooked perfectly. I loved the lights and it sure gave me good vibes.  The staff are very helpful and kind. Lovely place indeed :)

Was really looking forward to going to this place after seeing all the overwhelmingly positive reviews. However the place was a bit of a disappointment. It wasn't bad by a long shot, but my overall experience was mixed.  What struck me first the moment I walked in was the good ambience. Service was fine too. Then the food arrived. The chicken steak was alright but the rice it came with was extremely bland.   The burger would've been excellent had the buns been fresh. The buns did not have the fr...
Such an awesome place to dine and u guys r rocking in ur serving and ur ambience...good place for dinner and to enjoy...best time and best food...taste is on peak..keep it up...

Absolutely brilliant! For the first time I felt I'm dining in a different place with regard to food ! The variety and options are amazing! The chicken is perfectly infused with your choice of filling and toppings and is sucha delight to your taste buds ! The appetizers and desserts also adds delight to your meal ! Keep it going :)
Great fresh place with a pleasing vibe and some really good food on offer. The presentation is amazing, and we loved the nachos and the Belgian waffles.

We traveled almost 20 km's to experience Jonah's Bistro as per several word of mouth. Reaching around 2 in the afternoon, the place looked a bit congested with a large group occupying the center area. The AC circulation was very poor and the main counter had only desert jars for display.   Honey Garlic Chicken – 4/5 Everything was fresh with an amazing sauce.  European Breakfast Combo - 2.5/5 An average presentation with a ‘minute maid’ orange juice.  The bacon and sausages looked like '...

Jonah's has always been put on a pedestal by friends who've visited it. I did try Jonah's once before, the one on Kastur Rangan Road. This was the first time I tried Jonah's Bistro. I was not really mightily impressed with either of the two outlets. I went for a small snack at Bessie. Ambience: Elementary. It is a cozy, simple place with a shelf of books and all. Food: We had three items. Corn and cheese dipped in bajji batter: Nothing too exotic. Quantity was less. Red Pasta: Ordinary. I did no...

The Restaurant area & Food: Took the 1300 rupees package, offering options in veg/non-veg. In Veg - the 2 pizzas were average-tasting, not hot enough, but the potato tangy dish was good. The service was bit slow/un-cordinated.  The Rooftop area/Bar/Club: Because it rained, there was a sea of water on the entire floor, which should've been cleaned by a staff member if possible to some extent. Because was dangerous otherwise, being marble. Good bar service & songs otherwise.

Jonah's bistro, they have a very good menu starting from soups and snacks. The main course is no less. Lot of options. Good place to enjoy lunch. Desserts are different like they have crepes and waffles instead of boring ice creams and cakes.

I literally don't know where to start.. ok so .. I'm a hardcore non vegetarian.. but sometimes I do crave for vegetarian food too.. so one day we thought why don't we give this a try as we have noticed huge crowd waiting everytime we pass by rajdhani.. there were few welcome drinks.. some juice and a lassi.. then they starting serving.. we knew it was rajastani style of food .. but where was the food??? We were wondering the whole time if that is it or there is more to come.. everything was serv...

A great place to enjoy Rajasthani thali. It's an unlimited fiesta of the best of Rajasthan. All the items stood out of the plate giving you a diverse taste all around.The staff were courteous and even allowed us to visit the kitchen which can be observed from outside. Overall 5 stars.

Rajdhani barely exceeded my expectation. Went on a Tuesday so the thali costed 250 Rs. However, if you go on a Tuesday you do not get the special "aamlicious" thaali. (There's always a catch)  My first impression wasn't a good one. There was no grand welcome that is characteristic of Rajdhani. Had to wait for about 20 mins after the opening time to be served. On top of that the restaurant wasn't air conditioned properly leaving the place with a bad odor.  Things eventually did improve. The foo...
Nice food. You can taste all rajasthani food here. Serving is very very good. They request you to eat more. Food will be non spicy but tasty. Best food for best price.

Have heard a lot about this thali. Made it for dinner. The entry was very impressive. They welcomed with a traditional Indian welcome thali, of flower petals, sweets etc.  The service was great and fast.  I loved the ammras, bhindi ki sabji, daal Bati churma, and mini chapatis, theplas and pooris. The over all food experience was good. The Jalebi was great. But they can include some more desserts into the item list.  They can include some more unique dishes with the price they are taking for eac...

Had my breakfast at 7:15 AM yesterday at this place.. Good range of options were there for breakfast, it was very affordable great price for the consumers... I had Ghee Masala Dosa and Podi Idli, Idli was a real awesome Masala Dosa was bit more oily.. Service needs a slight check for getting 5/5... Thanks for great breakfast...

Heard so many great things about this place .Always wanted to visit this and not to forget the very famous jigarthanda . I loved it totally completely madly in spite of my brother cursing me for bringing him 50kms for this .They also complained about it being overtly sweet but I loved it .I was secretly hoping that it would be available in the airport only to my dissappointment.    <span><a class="at-tags at-tags-6964731" href="https://www.zomato.com/users/vivek-dutta-roy-6964731">Vivek Dutta Ro...

Love idlis!? This place is a haven for the vegetarians. With a number of idli varieties and even more number of dosa varieties, this place confuses you to choose from.   The service is pretty fast and the place is clean. Not so packed during the day, but mind you, in the evening the place becomes crowded with foodies and vegetarian lovers.   The place is easily locatable (even for first timers) or you can ask Google for that very needed help.   The food is delightsome, but calorie freaks (Beware...

Best place for idlis and onion Uthappam! 👌🏼👍🏻  They give amazing 5 varieties of chutneys, which we wouldn't have even imagined.. some podi and sambar too! ☺️☺️  Idlis are their best! And not to forget yummy sweety sweet Pongal! 😍  Kuzhipaniyaram - with some cheese! A different combo! 😃  Podi idli, podi dosa are also their best checklist menus! 😬😬  And off late, not to forget the jigirdhanda! 😊  A budget breakfast with amazing quality, taste.

Murugan idly kadai is known for its idly  But it also has the best jigurthanda In Chennai  It' shouldn't be compared with Madurai jigurthanda  But in chennai it's one among the best  Worth for the money Cost rs.60 per glass ...  ...................................................................................
Average food.. my friend even found hair in her chicken😔... the only good thing was the dessert  🍰.. ambiance was nice.. service was very slow. Definitely not value for money.

Quaint little place right on the busy main road.  The chicken cheese melt we ordered gave us second thoughts about the place. Starters were a disappointment. Went it directly for the minute steaks and the bad start was immediately forgotten. Extremely scrumptious!! One of the very very few places in chennai that can serve a good steak. Left us with no room for dessert. A quick hot latte later, we were done with a worthy meal.

Two words, ambience and decor. Feels like walking into an old Victorian curiosities shop. They serve the best of what's listed on the menu and the desserts are amazing. They are all so formal in the way they present and conduct, keeps you ammused and entertained throughout.
This place delivers the best of whatever is listed on their menu! And the food tastes authentic! I wonder how every single item is made to perfection and presented so well! The desserts ❤️

It was birthday surprise for a close buddy Prashanth Vasu . Myself and my friends planned to hit chamiers cafe and surprise him . That was the first time as I parked my car went inside I was not able to find the cafe. After I went inside the cafe . The minute I stepped in I felt peace ( made peace) such a charming ambience people working or having nice time with their friends. If you ...

Ambiance : 5 out of 5 Service : it was a little slow. Staff was very courteous. I tried the mai Thai veg burger which was really good and had a espresso with whipped cream which was also awesome. The cookies given with the coffee were a no no.  Over call a nice place. A bit expensive as compared to CCD.  It's hard to find a parking space outside.   Over all experience:Thumbs up !!
My best hangout in Anna Nagar!  Addicted to their peri peri fries and Chicken wings.  They never disappoint you.  Even the desserts and cakes taste really good

Gave order @11.pm!! the 2guys who delivered fud was so kind nd humble!! Well impressed with their service! Thankq so much fa filling our tummies in midnyt with delicious fud! Especially #buffalo_chicken_wings❤️❤️ spicy nd saucy, soo good to eat! Nd pizza🍕 on time delivery nd presentation is awsum!! A must try in Anna nagar!

Tried drooly choco -it vas a chocolate bomb ,a thick shake and so much of chocolaty flavour and this one shake is enough to make you feel full . So have this at last after ur main course is done . . IBCD pizza was good and we asked for extra cheese but seemed like the normal ones ... chicken peri peri fries were so yummy chicken peri peri vas tangy and spicy loved the flavour

The tastiest cake I have ever tasted in recent times .. went there late at 11pm for a bday cake.. they had mango Tango.. at first I hesitated, as 1kg costed 950₹ with tax and decided to buy since I was left with no other option .. but then after everyone said that the cake was astonishing, I was happy with my choice..  Monster shake is a must try here ❤❤

Wanted to try this out since they serve Parsi food and it's definitely worth a try..  Ambience was soo good and the staffs were very polite..  Totally loved the taste of food.. Mamaiji's prawn kebab and mutton keema pav are my favourites here..    Started to love this cuisine..  Everything should try out this cuisine Atleast once..    To sum it up,  a peaceful and good experience..
Delicious food available here. Loved the dhansak and the keema pav. The prices are decent and the food is really unique and amazingly mouth watering.

Food was delicious.  We ordered lollypop na farcha, which were yummy.  But the best part was the dhansak. This was my first experience with Parsi food and it simply amazing.  The ambience of the place is good and it's quite clean. Parking is also available.  Overall amazing experience
Good restaurant with new dishes :)  Can try once definitely  :) All were kind of bland dishes but tasted good. Ambience was good and a place to relax.

If you like medium spicy and slightly sweet food, this is your spot. With a mix of sugar and spice in a delightful combination, this place offers lovely parsi food at a very reasonable price. We ordered chicken lollipop na farcha and non vegetarian dhansak. These two dishes are quite filling and enough for two. Try them for a nice holiday brunch. The service is also quite prompt.

One of the best dessert place in Chennai. We had a Lychee lake, Ferrero Rocher and a Nutella Brownie iceCream. My personal favourite is their Nutella Brownie. Rich brownie taste in very mouth you take. Ferrero Rocher could have been better. And Lychee was good.

Abysmal and inconsiderate hospitality. One doesn't expect the store duty manager (Mr. Sahadev) to have a take it or leave it attitude. A make your own creation (myoc) comes with one big topping and 4 small toppings. These details are not mentioned in the menu as the customer is instructed and expected by cream stone to ask the staff.  I was point blank refused any form of leeway when I requested them to give me just 2 different toppings but twice the quantity to make up the 4 small toppings I am...

Went around 3pm on Sunday.  Place was so rushed up. Had to wait nearly 20 mins for seating. Ordered butterscotch n Arabian nights n vanilla it was really nice.  After 20 mins of asking we got water bottle. I wish service is lil quicker. Other than that everything's fine.

Night drive mode on .. I was hungry for ice cream and mangoes.  Alwarpet was near by as I searched on zomato we found this place.  We entered and couldn't find a place to sit at 12 am was waiting like 30 min to get seats and those ice creams were amazing .. taking of one star from the rating for the 30.min waiting .
Have always been fond of thir fruit punch and litchee flavored ice cream. Good seating as well as the packing is good for delivery. A stress buster for me :)

Had to plunge in for a super quick lunch before a movie along side 2 vegetarians, doing quick search on zomato I found this place with high ratings and low pricey ! yayyy !   Parking car is definitely an issue here, however 2 wheeler parking can be done hassle free.  It's an house renovated into a restaurant, the bright colours of the middle aged building makes you feel at home. the seating is not so posh, but is comfortable. The big wall paintings are traditional and good looking.  In this fast...

Have been here n number of times and trust me the food remains great as ever. Have had no complains and have always loved it. Prices are fine,staff is good and courteous. Everything is good..no complains! Going back again and again

their rotis were not as good as expected, but the dosas were some what ok, I liked red rice dosa, but davanagere benne dosa was a disaster. Most of their dosas tasted very sour, I think the batter is fermented too much because of the summer climate, they has to keep a check in that. I loved the water they served, they mixed some spices nd herbs like cinnamon, basil.... nd they store it in mud pots.

Undoubtedly, the one of the best restaurants in town! I see that PGB just opened a new franchise in Bangalore too! Very soon, all over the world maybe? I'm hoping for that!   Food: 5/5 Concept and execution: 5/5 Ambiance: (a healthy surprise) 5/5 Service: 5/5. Of the thousand times I've been there, I noticed that they love all their customers!   Regards Ashish

If you want to make your friends & relatives to experience something different in chennai foodies, this is one of my best choice. Nowadays Tasty & Healthy will not come together & this is the exception with tradition too. Don't forget to taste all in many visits.. 👍🏼

I am not a fan of Buffet..    I don't have a great appetite neither I can hogg for hours. .. What matters is the food quality and I found that really missing   They should really check the quality and it is lost somewhere

We visited this place for a combined treat - went there on a weekday discount / offer. The starters were extremely good. The desserts were also quite good - wide selection on desserts and drinks. However, the main course was just average. Also the service was quite good and the waiters also served us a birthday cake and a customary birthday song as well.  Decent place considering the overall cost, post discounts, is decent.

Best Place in Chennai for buffet..You will get price worth, hygienic food and ambience ... Welcome drink is good.. You can enjoy Unlimited tasty starters and desserts here.. grill set up is good..good idea.. Main dishes are low but by eating starters itself u will feel stomach full..  good Place to visit..Don't Miss out..

Subhash Singh is the reason behind the 5 start rating. Service at any places makes or breaks most experiences and our server, Subhash, at BN provided the most memorable restaurant service ever. If I owned the place, I'd give him a special bonus every month.   We ate mostly starters and dessert. I'd recommend people to not fill heir stomach with drinks and main course as neither are as good as the starters.  EVERYTHING was great, so I'll mention only the special things- grilled watermelon and gri...

As its gonna b the start of Ramzan🎀, Me & Achu Blaze decided to celebrate. It was really hard to find a grill buffet as everytin was reserved. Finally I'm so grateful to #BbqNation for getting us a table on-the-spot inspite of your busy booking. U hv always kept ur bars high both in food & service😆😘 AMBIENCE of the place is great. Brown theme, clean & spacious👍 Complimenta...

I have ordered via Zomato and received the Iftar pack and barbeque chicken on time. Food was good.  One thing missed is the bill. The bill not delivered with the food. Sent mail to Zomato. They are unable to provide it. Can you send me the same? I need to submit this for reimbursement at office.

Now i completely agree sea shell have some good food. Last 2 times i went sea shell in different outlet, it was very bad experience and bad food too. Now i dont have any other option to take my evening snacks in perungudi area, so finally i choose my best this sea shell.   Ordered Mexican shawarma roll, filter coffee, dragon potato, veg grill sandwich and finally pomegranate juice. All food is awesome except veg grill its very cold and not grilled the vegetables in inside of sandwich.   But over...

When going to a restaurant you tend to expect the best of service from your waiters. But this wasn't the case when I went to sea shell. But let me first talk about the food, I had gone there with a friend and had ordered the following 1. Two chicken dum biryani s 2. Pepper BBQ chicken 3. Onion salad 4. "Hot sizzling brownie" it's a mouth full to say but wonderful to eat. The food biryani was hot and spicy just the way we liked it and came in two large bowls. The biryani was absolutely wonderful ...
Nice food with courteous staff..the only thing is the food quality is not as it would be in their okkiampet outlet. Wish to see them improving the food. Other wise ambience and service are good

Good ambience and a great place to have a weekend dinner. I haven't had a chance of eating crab anywhere in the near past. So I wanted to try crab and ordered Crab pepper fry and a shawarma. Both were good and it was worth the price too. I ended my dinner with a strawberry smoothie which was yummy too.   600 (approx) for 2 people

So I visited Ashvita's few days (sorry about the late review :P) It was a sudden plan to go here for dinner on a week day..it was kinda empty ( weekday so yeah ! )  Loved the way this place was set up..they had indoor and out door seating as well..we decided to sit outdoors They had cute lights and all..instantly liked it. tbh i wanted to go here just for their monster shake ..we ordered momos and pasta and ish Food was okish.. .nothing great but it was not bad and all Coming to the best part..T...

Beautiful, cozy place to chill and hangout. Parking might be an issue. Cozy ambience with outdoor seating as well. I had been here before for their chicago deep dish pizza. It was okay-ish. I had a feeling the tomato was a bit overripe which didnt do well for the dish because tomato puree comprised the majority of the dish. But their normal pizzas are amazing. They are so generous with their toppings. They listen to requests you might have, in case you don't want something on your pizza or if yo...

Peaceful ambience I generally visit this place with couple of my friends and I choose for outdoor seating it's so peaceful and perfect set-up to chill out and monster shake is a killer one keep rocking

monster shake monster shake monster shake....too much hyped....tatse is just normal just like your normal chocolate milk but with a wide range of extravaganza....pastas have a subtle taste...good but not so good.
This is one of the amazing looking places but food was really mediocre. Known for their monster shakes which lived up to its name. Vegetarian dishes were quite nice in comparison to the nonveg.

We ordered the tawa calamari, mushroom and cheese pasta with white sauce and chicken fried rice.  Taste: very good  Ambience: brilliant  Service: good Price: good But I'd suggest they reduce the quantity of the food served. It's a wee bit overwhelming. Otherwise this place is awesome.

Though we heard about this place long, we recently went there with more expectation. We ordered Tiger prawn, fish fry and chicken Briyani.  Fish taste is good. Please note there are better choices available in Chennai with more varieties and better taste.  Briyani is really really pathetic. There is no thalicha or any gravy served along with Briyani. Not much options for desserts.   Please don't choose fish of your choice. It costs double or more than double. Not impressive and definitely wouldn...

We ended up in this place after a drive from Chennai to mahabalipuram, it's a small hotel... But it's cozy and feels good. If you don't care about the looks, it's a perfect place to hang out if your wallet is not heavy. Everything here is very good and the cost is also very affordable.  If you are in mahab.. And wanna taste some good SEA FOOD.. Hit in here..   Ps.. There are 2 hotels in the same name opposite to each other and this review is for the traditional one.

I just got hyped by my friends and visited mahab's solely for checking this place out ..... I was initially skeptical about the decor and initial greeting they gave us.... But then all other factors were nullified by the food........ The quality and quantity of the food is awesome..... But the service is what concerns me.... There were a very few personnel attending us.... But still worth the hype...."for food alone"...... Mildly expensive....

Rice was cold... Prawn curry was taste less... Good ambience... But not good food... I got sick next morning.... Not recommended.... Well the staff serves fine but don't understand English or hindi... Hard to communicate with the staff n people in the hotel... Don't ask them if they have a specially because the person simply suggests the costliest dish they serve. However, the worst thing was cold rice as when I asked the waiter he said we serve like this ma'am...

Went for Sunday Buffet, Ambience is OK. Service is not up to the mark.   Food spread is limited, starter served at table but No grill. But non-veg starters were good, veg was disappointing. Main course was quite good and very limited dessert spread.  Can try once for the  non-veg starter.

Ordered non veg platter taste was ok, not enough starters where there and felt little bit costly... Fine dining with with warm ambience ... Wait time is more not very quick response..  Food : 2.5/5 Ambience : 3/5 Price : 2.5/5
Ambience is good..polite staff...asked for Briyani but Briyani not there @ 9:45pm... then tried promfert fry  its ok..but not delicious...Salt is very less in all dishes..

Pepper BBQ Chicken the best thing here to have... Visited 2nd time... Ambience is good.. awesome environment..chocolate icebreaker added a bliss to our desert... great taste...refined our tatse buds.. soup..softness of chicken, the best so far.. Courtesy Yam Bahadur
Decent ambience. Good service and soothing flavours. Their butter naan is amazing. Need to work more on Paneer Masala though. Overall rating - 3.5/5

Visited couple of days back with friend and had a good time. Order my favourite leham meshwi, mutton biryani and kozi leham...... mutton biryani was ok.... not tooo grt and service they need to look into...... over all ok ok......

It has happened to be our family resturant!! Food has never disappointed us!! Always its worth for your penny!! One of the best chain of resturants in chennai!! Especially royapettah zaitoon is awesome!!!😉😊
Nice ambience and a great place to hang out with family and friends. One of the best places in chennai to eat grills. Brownie with icecream was same as the others available in the cafes.
shawer mas are too good i love it...its perfectly made...Al Faham is also great.....i love these items here and oh yes...chocolate sizzling brownieee is yummyanoo...

One of my friend took me here....we have ordered some chicken soup first...this was the first time i ever tried soup as i never had it.... I gave it a try it was so good that i ended up with two..starters were good we ordered dragon chicken and i don't remember much as this happened few years back
A cozy place with decent thin crust pizza and fries. Friendly staff too.  We ate light as we were not hungry when we went to this place. Will visit sometime soon when hungry. ☺️👍

AN ITALIAN CLASSIC BUT ....  We enjoyed a great time in this well renowned classical restaurant. You won't be surprised to see all the attention that goes into making your meal a worthwhile one   RECOMMENDED : sea-food pizza   COULD HAVE BEEN BETTER : the stuffed mushrooms ended up being over saucy and it was almost like a main course. The bruschetta was too plain on the contrary.

I live in Delhi & visited Chennai recently. My friend & I visited Tuscana Pizzeria as we had heard a lot about it. We absolutely loved the Caramellizzato con Pancetta Pizza that is with bacon, pear, brie, caramelized onion & raw honey. The Chicken Parmigiana that is with chicken breast layered with mozzarella & homemade tomato sauce, baked & served on a bed of spaghetti with tomato sauce was super too. We followed this with a Lemon Cake that is zesty, airy, light lemon cake with lemon glazes & t...

I love eating healthy as I very interested in fitness and wellness. Tuscana is the restaurant I frequent the most. I love the food at my house as I am sure of the fat, carb, and protein content. But at Tuscana, I find it very easy to calculate and I have my favourites here. I prefer the Classic Tuscana Salad along with Fergjays chicken. I have also started eating the sautéed mushroom and broccoli or the spinach and garlic on the side. I really enjoy the loaded vegetable omelette made right. On ...

I went to Tuscana for some indulgance and I was not dissapointed.  We started with the Grilled Peppers with fresh Mozzarella. It was a great healthy option.  We also shared the Classic Tuscana Salad, the sweetness of the pear made this salad really special.  We ate the Caramellizzato pizza on a whole wheat crust.  We ended our fabulous meal with Lemon Cake. It was so light, and perfect. It went beautifully with tea. I will definitely come back many more times.

Been there for team lunch ! Food was quite good comparing to other branches with live grill starters ! Starters includes chicken, mutton,fish,prawns in non veg and veg includes panner, mushroom,baby corn,potato,pine apple for live grill. Main Course : very less in Non veg comparing VEG. Chicken briyani, butter chicken gravy,chilly fish gravy,mutton gravy Veg : As usual 2 rice varieties , curd rice, salads, papads, naan, 3 gravies. Desserts : 2 flavors of ice cream , brownie, 3 flavors of cake 1 ...
This place contains some tasty buffet and the price is also average. Though the options for veg is less than non veg the taste of the food is good. Can give a try !
Went for the dinner buffet with my gang of college friends. Starters were yummy! Desserts were also too good. Main course was a bit disappointing.

Went with my cousin and friends. We were 6 of us.  Opted for 4 non veg and 2 veg buffets.Initially asked them to serve a regular purified water.  Welcome drink was good with strong,chill litchi flavour and taken that as much we are able since the Chennai climate is so hot.  Compact menu not too much of superfluous starters to fill our belly which usually do the bbq restaurants.  Limited starters 5 and 5 each.  I have tried veggy also pizza was good and cheesyyyyy  Basil shrimps was good in the s...
They are providing only limited items comparing with AB BBQ. Dishes are good whatever they giving. If they add some more varieties, it will be good. Staffs are good. Ambiance is nice.

~ Critic to the point ~  Our order :  #1 Visit - Grill chicken full, Chicken special shawarma rolls, Prawn biriyani #2 Home delivery - Chicken shawarma, Alfaham Chicken half & Grill chicken half. #3 Home delivery - Butter chicken masala & Tandoori rotis  Pros : Excellent flavour, Succulent & tender chicken, Decent ambience.  Cons : Shawarma can be unpredictable, Grill chicken was good while @ the restaurant while when we ordered home, it was quite raw!  Can be better : Standard food quality.

I had lunch with my friends , i order biriyani , fried rice and lamb oyster ,the biriyani is not to wroth of price  fried rice is OK, lamb oyster really awesome but service is not to bad  . nice ambience . Service;2/5 Food;4/5 Ambience; 5/5
Had dinner with my family and we enjoyed the food.👍🏻.And good ambience while we entered the restaurant and cool place to hangout dine.................................
Online service was great.. enjoyed iftar pack.. good quality.. neat packing.. delicious to eat...Delivery was on time.. 140 character is too much..

Taste: 4/5 Service: 2/5 very poor VFM: 3.5/5 Ambience: 4/5  Pros: Great taste as any other Zaitoon restaurant. Cool ambience. Cozy and comfortable seating. I tried my favourite BBQ chicken here. It was delicious as always.  Cons: Horrible service though we were the only table occupied in that floor. Worst part is that the quantity of Mayo which comes with BBQ is just not enough (1 small cup that u see in the pic) and they charge for extra mayonnaise that shld come free with the BBQ. This time bi...

We went for a casual dinner on a weekday night. The restaurant had a few patrons at that time. The ambience is lovely and cheerful. The staff is nice and responsive and helpful. The table setting too is very pleasing. We had their preset four course meal as we were idiots on a budget. But that too was very fulfilling. The soup, both varieties were delicious. The pizza was nice too, but I felt the thin crust was a bit overdone. Of course, I also don't approve of pineapple on pizza as was on one o...
Worst experience.. Food was totally bad.. Waste of money. Never go to this place. My humble request Ambience worst...water worst... Everything worst Totally dreadful experience.

My earlier experience in other Spaghetti Kitchen stores in other cities compelled me to have a post-movie, late night dinner at this place. I headed to this place not with an expectation to be wowed but to just have dinner. 'Specialty Italian Restaurant' aside, this particular store can hardly whip out the humblest and plainest of a pizza. We ordered a Pizza L'Ortolana and a Sizzling Brownie. I have not seen a more lame pizza in my life, precisely 2 corn-kernels a slice, small mushroom pieces on...

I lost count of how many times I have visited this place.. i love this place!! Their caesar salad, bolognese pasta, spagetti with meat balls and pizzas are great..!! if you love Italian food.. this place is a must visit! Good ambience and service has always been good! Highly recommend!
Non gourmet food at gourmet prices. Orders were  1. Their famous Back pepper chicken 2. Risotto 3. Pasta  Chicken was slightly dry , other dishes were also ordinary.

I love chef jacob's style of cooking...The menu holds new different dishes . For soup we had nejelembu rasam and kozhi soup . Both had good flavours and perfect level of spiciness. For starters , we had chicken Chinthamani and chutney fish fry . Chicken Chinthamani is more like karivadai and chutney fish fry is very soft . we have ordered manpaanai chicken biryani, pallipalayam kaima biryani for main course. Biryanis were good and had nothing interesting . Biryani and manpanai meen kolanbu combi...

This restaurant is one of the very good restaurant in Chennai which I have been recently. As a foodie I use to explore many restaurants and this was in my list for a long time and finally went there. And this is the only restaurant for which am providing rating. Taste is fantastic and really like a home made. Ambience with a dim light looks really good. First time I went knowing about Chef Jacob and thought of trying.. We ordered a Fish Meal...when the meals arrived it was smelling awesome...whe...

I was a huge fan of Jakobs kitchen.  Was upset that it was closed.  Then came to know that it was opened as tamarind.  Was skeptical about the taste.  So I ordered through zomato, the all time favourite meen saapadu.  Man, the food and flavour has not been altered.  So much satisfied. Quickly going to visit it soon.

We were planning for a super spicy non veg dinner and finally ended up here..!!  As soon as we entered the restaurant we were not impressed by the ambience but we just sat there and ordered with hesitation. But to our surprise the food wasn't so bad.  For starters, we ordered chicken chintamani which wasnt impressive and for main course we ordered egg kothu  parota, nei  sooru, chicken varutha curry, urulai varutha curry, Kal dosa and parota.  We were so much satisfied  with the main course. Kal...

Hey guys, this is a well known Jacob Kitchen now renamed as Tamarind - Chef Jacobs team.. have been there long back couple of years ago.. the restaurant setup is same with improvements in ambience but no less taste than earlier.. thoroughly enjoyed the food but I guess the prices have gone high.. tasted very good... Tried appam, mutton gravy, fish.. all of them were too good.. must visit.. cheers

70422.name: The Brew Room - The Savera Hotel

reviews.rating_text: The best place to order a coffee and to chill . I'll go there any day and can have a peaceful moment. The staffs are good and the place is well maintained . Has a beautiful ambience and good food .
Good food friendly staffs it's too busy on evenings must try Swiss chocolate smoothie and mozerellla sticks peaceful ambience reasonable price

I finally visited brew room! Yippee! Well it was a spl occasion n I had asked Rishika, the cute lil gal who runs thz place if she can arrange a set menu for 2 people wit a candle light for an early dinner. She gave us some amazing menu options and made the evening a very memorable one. So I chose to go with watermelon feta salad, citrus salad, veg lasagne, siciliana veg pizza, brownie sundae, orea nutella cake, watermelon n orange juice. Since the nutella cake wasn't available, we were given som...

The ambience is decorated with beautiful lights and a very nice place to meet up!The food wasn't that great as expected and to get the menu card we had to wait for almost 15 mins so the service isn't that great but you can visit once for the place!
Calm & peaceful!! Great outdoor ambience which is near to the pool.... coffees are awewome! Affordable pricing too!! Get the Saturdays rolling here!!

I Visited chennai a couple of days ago. My friend took me to this place, bcz i love italian cuisine. The location is really nice, as it is just 500m away from the Elliots beach. Coming to the ambience. The Ambience is very good and beautifuly decorated. The Pizzas we had was delicious. I would definitely suggest to try "Manali Mushroom Pizza". Overall, i loved this place.  ❤✔
Good food..little bit heavy on the pocket..but once in a while it's fine. The ambience is good and service is also to be appreciated. Definitely visiting this place again!
We had been to little italy fr sunday brunch..itz a nyc place wid a pleasing atmosphere..everythng was cheesilicious ..tz a pure heaven fr cheese lovers lyk me 😃and d service was also good ..

The ambience was pleasant and wonderful on top of a brisk and awesome service. The food was delicious and there where a lot of varieties in the buffet. The price was reasonable. It was a delightful experience. Recommended.
Great comfort Italian food complimented with exceptional service.  The buffet was great value for money with a decent spread. But what takes it away is the great service by the staff.

I have been here before and this is my second visit. Prices range of this place is normal as other equivalent restaurants. I am happy about the quality of food they serve and the quantity is also quite fine. There isnt much to tell or nothing special about this place. Many of the staff attitudes are not good at all that we can literally see while they take order and you put any question to them, however there are few good staffs as well.

These days i have a become a regular to this place. Predominant reason being .....they provide ample car parking space in a congested shanthi colony road. When compared to murugan idly or saravana bhavan or sri vari in anna nagar its quite easy to get a parking space here. I would thank the owners for allocating a seperate parking space tht too of the area of the size of the restaurant.   Coming to ambience ...its bright and vivid. Its always buzzling with people. You have adequate staffs to att...

Decided to try south Indian lunch after a long time, zeroed down to akshayam. The AC side was a bit expensive compared to the non AC segment, but it was worth it. The south Indian meals was placed at 150 plus tax. The ambience was great and we decided to give this place a try. We ordered south Indian Thali.  Dhal podi, ghee, and pickle were kept in the table. The Thali had sambar, dhal, koothu, vetta kozhambu, chappathi, karma, appalam,pickle, spiced butter milk tampered with ginger, green chill...

The way of packing milkshake I have ever seen :D you need to give your employees some sleep. Else, this is what will end up happening. Don't go for the ghee dosa, it's very salty and has badly cooked dosas. Waiters don't give too much response. Overall had a bad experience during my visit.

Akshayam is known for its south indian Delicacy and now its kind of a spoilt brat. Before the place was so nice and now its feels to be crowded always and the food taste has become low compared to the Akshayam which was at its earliest. It had its best and now its gone way too low. Wish they would change the change 😪

Cafe kind of place but with lot varieties in there menu. For us two friends bill was about Rs. 1285 in which we had this hot saucy BBQ wings ( 6pieces )  , in drinks dry fruit shake and peach lemon ice tea , both served in big glasses (enough for 2 each glass) , with this we had 2 burgers one as chicken mexican burger (slight spicy) and other was DT special chicken (which i didn't find that good , was not spicy little blant) . Food is good worth the money and the service is Awesome :)

Food's good but overpriced but that's okay depending upon the location. The sizzlers are all delicious n mouth watering .  Burgers are 7/10 ! Haven't tried more than that ! Place is good ! Ambience everything top notch !
Good food one of the best place to visit in bessie they serve milo hot and cold service is late friendly staffs price is little high good cafe aa
Do NOT order from this place. I ordered a salad yesterday and suffering from food poisoning since. Just horrible and stale food. Never ordering from here again

Downtown Cafe...!!!   Comes in the must visit list. This place serves amazingly amazing food and the best place to hang out with friends and can go in as couples too. Their have a very good ambience nice calm  cool and the interiors are seriously awesome and it is located in besant nagar you want anything more than that only issue is the car parking as there is no proper parking space so gotta go in search for parking your car.   This place actually serves great smoothies so any time your want a...

We decided on a pub night out and I wanted it to go smooth without any incidents coz my hubby was a first timer. As in as a couple and in chennai after Mumbai. We went thru so many pubs and decided on illusions owing to the ratings and warnings that seemed manageable.  Maybe it was my over enthusiasm on a night out for the first time without my baby darling to a pub (parents with no babysitters will understand) my shoes decided to fall apart n I was sitting there thinking that maybe I ought to b...
Fantastic place to hangout .... Outstanding food .... Courtasious staff .... Super cool music .... Wow experience always !!! Plan it with frnds / family for 1 galla tym 😀

Place has a an amazing ambience with LED lights. Being from Mumbai loved the music, it was great.. had a great time with cousins.. food quality and quantity was nice.. had minimum food as less jain options available. Will surely visit the place again on my next Chennai visit
Have been once on a Friday.. horrible service !!only illusions reality is horrible... Please improve on weekends .. food is average. Prixy  menu

The ambience was quite nice... Good music.. nice crowd.. lots of options in the menu... Mocktails, crispy corn and chilli Chicken, thats what we had. The place is happening with awesome music and a dancing space.. go with an open mind and enjoy the loudness.... The rating is for not getting a good seating place.. we were told that a lot of people have reserved.. it didn't look like that though.. if you're going there .. either make reservations or go late so that you get to the dance floor right...

Was very much disappointed with my visit to this place. Which ever disk I ask for, the waiter shakes his head with a big Nooo Sir that's not available now! And also wayy too costly for the food they serve! Mangalore Bonda was pretty good and the 2 starts rating is only for the Mangalore Bonda there. There are better places in and around this area to try out.
Perfect for night show movie goers Very nice place...   South Indian food is very good..  Specially sambhar .... Food 4/5.. Service 4.5/5  Ambiance 4/5
The food is ok but the service is very bad not worth going there. If one goes it is at their risk. I live just few hundred metres from the hotel.
very good place for breakfast buffet.especially you must try dinner buffet during weekends.pasta is very fantastic over there.You have parking space over there

I wasnt really excited to visit this place. Fortunately,  the food turned out to be really good. The ambience was simple and had proper air conditioning!    We decided to take the buffet option rather than the Ala- carte!  The buffet here had a great variety  :') We started with a refreshing watermelon juice followed by a sizzling hot clear soup, which was very good. They had a lot of dishes. From amazing starters to Italian dishes. All of them tasted good. They had schezwan noodles, mixed veget...
Place for tandoori and kababs.  I personally didn't like their rotis  ( butter nan and roomali roti were pathetic).  Faloodas were filled mostly with ice cream.  Need to improve a bit.

Home delivery was quick and the food was delicious. Tandoori chicken full was awesome and afghani chicken was decent enough and top all this the biryani was delicious. It's a good place to try for smaller treats.
Once ordered Tandoori chicken and it was  super awesome.. esp whn had with mayo (extra cost though) and quick delivery.. will defn order again..
Good food and service. Starters are really Delicious. Not really an economical restaurant, but you get to taste a large variety of food.Decent Ambiance
In love with their Tandoori and Mayonnaise! Made me visit them 3 times the same week. Worth every penny. Fried rice was also pretty good. Will recommend to friends 👍🏻
Nice place for a weekend lunch with friends. Go here for the food quality and you will not be disappointed. The menu is quite impressive and service is decent.
This is like my 5th visit to cream centre located in Nungambakkam  Cheese balls was yummmmm,to be precise it was amazing And had sizzler , as always their sizzlers are outstanding
Wonderful taste... delicious... the serving people are so pleasing and on toes.. do give a try... had a wonderful dinner with family...❤❤❤❤❤

Ambience  food service value for money 5/5  What's not to like about this place  Always amazing food  All time fav ragda patties   Tried their new menu did not like the pav bhaji  Do try the paneer ka baap sizzler and cream centre biryani

A great place to try Italian food. Even their Indian food is amazing. The best nachos in town. If you go here their nachos, onion rings and pasta is a must. Personally, I love their pasta arabiata. Even their sizzling brownie is amazing. In their Indian, the panner is amazing and so soft it just melts in your mouth. Even their Channa bhautra is great.

Spent a lazy Saturday lunch here. The fresh juices were fantastic. The flavoured labaneh lived up to its fresh pedigree. The pizza#10 was so so. It can do with some more sauce and finer cuts of the bell peppers. Then came the disappointing desserts. The ricotta cheese cake was an insipid disaster. Hard as a rock and with no flavour at all. The two scoops of the 'Italian style' ice cream were no better. Not churned properly it was as though someone had scooped up two ice balls and served them to ...

An all round good place. Visited it twice this week already. The first time I enjoyed the place with one another friend so we couldn't try out a lot of dishes. But we definitely enjoyed the noon with a long time at the place despite the Chennai heat!!   Second time. It was the fooood... Crab masala was too good. Roast chicken achari was delicious including the rice and the fresh vegetables.@ Everything served was fresh and we completely enjoyed it with our team. A very hearty meal. Loved it.  Th...

Highlights: Good but more expensive for its goodness at the same time. Nice farm ambiance with lot of greenery and trees all over, good food and service. Outdoor seating under the tree shade will be perfect for a Sunday early morning breakfast, as the weather will not be too hot. You can even choose indoor seating covered with a rooftop and surrounded by net ensuring the greenery view is not compromised. Nice hangout for families with kids. Kids get some getaway space to run around safely and ad...

Ambience- average but different, and hence might pull people.  Service- average. Nothing great and the owner/manager was slightly sour.  Food- expensive and bad. They do have a variety of things but most things taste below average and when reviewed along with the prices it was very bad. We ordered a mango salad which was promised to come with pesto- but there was no trace of pesto and the salad in itself was terrible. We returned it. Hibiscus (which was spelt incorrectly) soda and ginger-lemon s...

It was the tamil new year and my sister Mridula Ganesan asked me to come to a place for lunch which was outside of the city I had to pay tollbooth fee to reach this place which made me skeptical. After I entered this restaurant it was place was like my grand mom and grand pa used to live back in my home town cows, cock, Turkey, etc parked the car entered the food serving area it was like wow just wow...
The Kebabs are Very Great here and i ate chicken tikka and Malai chicken Tikka and worth for the price and they have various kebabs in veg also

The most succulent and lip-smackingly good Kebabs in town. This is hands down the best place to try kababs. Had the Malai chicken kabab, Green kashmiri kebab, Chicken Sheekh kebab, Chicken tikka and kebab rolls with romali rotis. Everything was good and this is place I will be a regular to from now on.   Also everything is made fresh and the service was super fast, they start putting the marinated meat on the skewers only after you order.

Good taste, smiling faces serving hot food. Over all an amazing place for non vegetarians. The t ii me taken to serve the order could be a little faster, sure there's place for improvement on that. But, a delicious meal can let that go. No complaints. Great food.

This place has amazing mouth watering ,"eye watering" kebabs , it's a small place but to find it just look for a street where a lot of people are standing inside and outside a shop and that is the place recommended only for spice lovers because the fooddd was hoottttt! Kebab Corner

A one room wonder, the place serves up some serious kebabs and rolls all in front of an open charcoal grill where you can literally hear the meat cook and crackle. They provide a small wooden slab where you can place your little plates, stand and quickly down these melt in your mouth kebabs. I tried the afghani veal and chicken kebabs. A generous dose of cream was poured over these well cooked kebabs and an equally good dose of mint chutney was given with some handy onions. All in all a very sum...

We visited the place for a weekday lunch..the place seemed to be a hot pot and they casually responded that the AC isn't working and placed a standing fan for our petty group of 20...lol..food..decent...I liked the fish and garlic chicken..but we waited for years to get the starters refilled and raita came along with deserts..:p..overall the place is below par and it makes sense given the price they put for a meal...you get what you pay for !!!

Went here to have sizzlers.We ordered Grilled peri peri chicken sizzlers and nandu ularthiyathu. Must say..both were below average.I was totally disappointed after having sizzlers. Nandu ularthiyathu tasted like cabbage poriyal ..i didn't get any taste of crab at all. Atlast to get rid off the taste of food , i ordered one juice.My bad..juice was worser than the food.🙄
Food wasn't good... Chicken was served almost raw... Veg dishes will be good if you are lucky... Was forced to go there because my boss gave me discount  coupons...

It's a nice restro having a big name in chennai since a long time. So visited this place but then understood it's a hyped up place. Service was disappointing don't know why. Quality of food is OK. Pricing is on the higher side. Ambience is good so no such complains.

A classic example of erosion over time;  DiMoRa, my to-go place for a casual lunch when it opened. The Menu was fresh and had a wide range; the taste was great and was not too hard on your pocket either. A good place to escape at a time when restaurants changed but menus didn't.
